Campus Destinations is a leading information services company for college campuses and college-based communities. Since 2004, the company has operated successfully to save students both time and money. College students and the local communities benefit from multiple products and services the Company offers, including:

  • CD Citations: Campus Destinations’ citation tool which allows users to automate citations in MLA format for free. Users can upgrade to premium / pro accounts to get more features including APA and Chicago / Turabian citations.

  • Black Card: The Black Card enables the college community to save at various national and local vendors. Over the years, Campus Destinations has partnered with such vendors at Chipotle, 1-800 Flowers, and Shoes.com to bring discounts to the college market.

  • Textbooks Search: Campus Destinations has created an easy to use interface to search, compare and buy textbooks from various vendors including: Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Half.com and more. Average savings from users using this feature are above 60%.

  • Classifier: Classifier enables students to optimize their schedule on-campus. The application allows students to pick various classes in a primary and secondary bookbag and compare schedules in real time. Students can also schedule personal events, input comments, and export their schedule to Outlook / iCal and Facebook.

  • On Campus Information: Campus Destinations has aggregated content about on-campus locations at over 40 universities. These popular campus destinations highlight facilities, cool facts and more.

  • Local Business Information: Campus Destinations has aggregated content about local businesses around 40+ universities. Users can explore recommendations, reviews and information at all of these locations and registered users can share their experiences.

funding_rounds.source_description: Mirror42 Secures New Funding From Private Plus Fund and Solid Ventures

name: Mirror42
overview: Mirror42 enables businesses to implement performance management. At Mirror42 we believe that every company, big or small, should be able to measure themselves without having heavy investments in Enterprise Business Intelligence and without ending up in spreadsheet management. Performance management is about communicating and sharing information. The Internet and Software as a Service provide new opportunities for performance management professionals.

name: Medioh!
overview:
Medioh is a video search engine powered by RSS video aggregation. Medioh! claims to enable users to create their own tailored viewing experience, “with access to the broadest range of content available on the web.” They offer an API to allow developers to manipulate a database of aggregated video feeds and create their own customized customer-facing application.

Features available through the API include searching and filtering by all sorts of information about a video, including its title, description, and tags, as well as information about its quality including resolution, duration, and codec.

funding_rounds.source_description: Lonely No More: Lonelygirl15 Production Company EQAL Gets $5 Million Funding
Lonelygirl15 Creators File To Raise $3.5 Million For Web Series Company EQAL

name: EQAL
overview:
EQAL is a next-generation media company that combines technology and people to power 24/7/365 digital media properties around consumer brands and celebrities. An EQAL media property is a multiplatform digital magazine that creates a seamless experience for fans across various devices and social networks. With more than 40 media properties, EQAL’s award-winning Media Networks include Jennifer Lopez.com; Bethenny.com; Elizabeth Banks.com; ToriSpelling.com; Lauren Conrad.com; Alicia Silverstone’s TheKindLife.com; Derek Hough.com; YouTube phenoms ElleandBlair.com and Michelle Phan.com; WalkWithWalgreens.com, KRAFT’s Effie Award winning RealWomenofPhiladelphia.com and others. The growing EQAL network reaches more than 60 million trend-setting consumers and generates billions of content impressions every month. EQAL Media Studios produces the portfolio of content for the YouTube Original fashion & beauty channel u look haute. EQAL was founded by online programming pioneers Miles Beckett and Greg Goodfried who created many of the “firsts” in the development of the online video industry with lonelygirl15, KateModern and Harpers Globe.

EQAL’s pop culture-obsessed teams of editors; writers, designers and social media experts create multiplatform media properties in partnership with familiar personalities and brands across numerous verticals.

Umbrella is our proprietary social publishing platform that powers our network of highly interactive social websites and mobile apps. The core platform is an API that integrates dozens of third-party API’s, including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Foursquare, Instagram and more. Because Umbrella websites and applications are connected via API’s to popular social networks like Facebook and Twitter, our media properties are “service and device agnostic,” making it easy for fans to interact with the property on their favorite social network using their preferred device.

The Umbrella platform consists of a web-services application and RESTful API that provides a generic interface for dozens of third-party social API’s. Applications built on top of the Umbrella API can seamlessly read-write data across multiple services with fewer API calls and lower overhead. The platform includes a content management system and a mobile publishing application, and provides a framework for future application development including mobile consumer apps, connected-television apps, and more.

 Our innovative “sponsored post” ad unit is integrated into the feed of content on the homepage of our celebrity websites and syndicated to social networks like Facebook and Twitter. Because the ads are shareable, like-able, and incorporate discounts and giveaways, they drive high levels of engagement and ROI. Leveraging our branded content team, brand advertisers can directly work with our celebrity partners to create an on-site “celebrity campaign” or a micro-site “branded community.”

EQAL’s worked with the biggest brands on earth, including Kraft, Walgreens, Avon, Clorox and more, and set the bar for social media advertising with the 2011 Effie award-winning Real Women of Philadelphia campaign.

The leadership team includes technology and creative executives from CAA, Disney, E! Entertainment, Firstborn, McKinsey, Trailer Park, MTV, FUSE TV, Idealab, and Amazon.

EQAL’s in house production arm, EQAL Studios, launched the YouTube Fashion & Beauty Original YouTube Channel, u look haute in April 2011. The core programming includes a mix of short form (3-5 minutes) and long form (12-22 minute) videos. u look haute features traditional celebrities like Lauren Conrad and Chelsea Kane, YouTube stars like Elle and Blair Fowler and developing YouTube talent in Mary Darling and Leah Ashley, ReNailz and Rachel DaMita in a slate of programming laid out like a network. The channel has consistently grown its audience in rapid succession through discovery and excitement over the episodic and on demand programming—viewership surpassed 1 million in 16 days; passed 2 million at the start of week 6; topped 3 million in less than eight weeks, exceeded 4 million just 17 days later and moved beyond the five million mark on July 6, three months after its launch, passing 7 million views in the first five months since its premiere. The channel debuted more than 140 videos totaling over ten hours of original programming in the first 15-week season.

relationships.title: VP, Video Production and Media Services

name: Podbean LLC
overview:
Podbean is a podcast service provider which opened in Feb, 2006. The initial idea was simple: The site allows users to start podcasting in an easy point-and-click blog-like environment with little-to-no technical knowledge.

This web-based system allows users to publish, manage and promote podcasts in just a few clicks. it supports RSS 2.0 and atom feeds as well as the extended Apple iTunes podcasting tags. The web 2.0 based podcast player can be embedded into websites, blogs and social networks around the web.

All Podbean accounts come with a personalized podcast site and include the ability to extend branding efforts by integrating Podbean into their own website seamlessly and feed to the user’s own domain. In addition, the reporting and statistics system allows publishers to measure the success and growth of their podcasts.

The company extended the service to business clients in January, 2008. Podbean Business Podcasting Solutions provides private podcasting and multi-casting features to benefit businesses even creating multiple podcasts for selected target audiences, while allowing multiple authors and administrators so teams and department representatives can collaborate and connect with each other to delegate different types of podcasting responsibilities.

name: Macroaxis
overview:
Macroaxis is an early stage startup company based in San Francisco Bay Area. The company specializes in providing software solutions for the financial services sector, facilitating rapid distribution of financial analytics to larger audiences.

Macroaxis Corporation’s wealth management platform delivers measurable value in the form of improved return on clients’ intellectual property, productivity and managed assets for financial institutions, wealth advisers, and investors of all levels. The company’s product is currently in beta and all the services are offered for free. The services can be compared to a full-featured template on which to manage and analyze financial activity and trends quickly and effectively, and it appears to deliver those comprehensive qualities in a straightforward fashion, which should appeal to many prospective users.

The company does not position itself as a social investing site, but rather as a collaborative wealth management platform that is based on educated approach to asset selection and allocation enabling investors to present complex wealth management analytics in the context of Modern Portfolio Theory (MPT). Company’s implementation of MPT is based on simplicity, speed, accessibility and enhanced user experience, making technology that was once accessible only to professional money managers, available to the entire investing community.

name: Muxlim
overview:
Muxlim Inc. runs and operates the world’s largest Muslim social media network of websites and services.

The company is founded in Finland by Mohamed El-Fatatry and Pietari Päivänen, aiming to provide cutting-edge online services to the Muslim-Lifestyle Market around the world. The company was chosen as a finalist for the Red Herring Europe 100, and the top 100 high growth success stories in Finland 2008 by Helsingin Sanomat the largest Finnish newspaper.

Muxlim Inc. is currently reaching tens of millions of visitors from over 190 countries and its staff come from 8 different countries. The number of monthly uniques in April 2008 is about 2+ million. 35% of the users are from the USA.

name: FlipKey
overview:
FlipKey is a community driven travel site that helps consumers find trusted vacation rental homes throughout the world, by providing real reviews of verified vacation rental properties.

FlipKey organizes the reputation of vacation rental properties throughout the world, by verifying that homes are represented by legitimate managers/owners and then collecting detailed reviews from real guests.

FlipKey employs the industry’s only closed review system that limits reviews to confirmed past guests. FlipKey’s Reputation Management tools then allow for vacation rental managers to post public responses to both positive and negative reviews to facilitate a constructive dialog concerning the quality of individual properties and services provided.

Vacationers can use FlipKey.com to evaluate over 50,000 verified vacation rental properties and then book their accommodations directly online or call/email the manager for more information.

name: MUBI
overview:
MUBI is your online cinema, anytime, anywhere. MUBI will give you the latest buzz from the Cannes Film Festival or a restored masterpiece personally chosen by Martin Scorsese (he’s a member, too!). A social network that can let you find a visual gem that will definitely not be released in the local multiplex and allows you to find a girl in Tokyo who loves Kubrick (she actually exists, her name is Yuko and she’s into Wong Kar-Wai too!). MUBI invites you to watch, discover and discuss distinctive visionary films from all over the world.

Founded in 2007 by Efe Cakarel, MUBI is backed by Celluloid Dreams, The Criterion Collection and Costa Films, supported by the MEDIA Programme of the European Union, and is the exclusive partner of The World Cinema Foundation and SONY Electronics. MUBI is based in Palo Alto, London, Paris, and New York.

funding_rounds.source_description: UserVoice raises $800K for customer feedback systems
Uservoice Hears $1M

name: UserVoice
overview:
UserVoice creates simple customer engagement tools that help companies understand and interact with their customers more positively and build customer relationships that last.

With more than 90,000 organizations signed up and thousands of customers, UserVoice products include:

UserVoice Feedback - a hosted tool for gathering and prioritizing product ideas directly from a company’s customers.

UserVoice Helpdesk - a simple-to-use ticketing system that helps companies solve more customer issues in less time.

UserVoice Full Service - a complete customer service solution that bundles Feedback and Helpdesk into a single, easy-to-manage environment.

name: Tsheets
overview:
Every 1.3 seconds, somewhere in the world, an employee tracks time with TSheets. Thousands of companies in 28 countries trust TSheets online timesheet technology and reporting technology.

TSheets is the magic ingredient to making it all work; employees fall in love with how easy time tracking is. Employees can track time anywhere, any way they want—using a computer, mobile phone, tablet, GPS-enabled app, text, dial in number and so much more—with clock in / out punch card or manual timesheet flexibility.

All this adds up for everyone, from HR and IT decision-makers to employees clocking in and out every day. TSheets is the #1 employee rated and requested time tracking system on the planet. This core passion makes a real difference for bottom line productivity and accountability across the board. With TSheets, owners and managers can keep track of everything—employees, locations, notes, job codes, even paid time off, vacation and holiday hours—in real time.

Then, they can report it all with data driven precision, running payroll, billing and invoices against time tracked, making calculated accuracy a way of doing business. If desired, administrators can also often instantly sync timesheet data with their existing bookkeeping software, even integrating with QuickBooks in just one click.

Founded in 2006 as the innovative brainchild of CEO Matt Rissell and chief programmer Brandon Zehm, TSheets headquarters is in Eagle, Idaho, but TSheets’ time tracking technology lives in “the cloud,” where data stays secure and accessible no matter where your company goes, no matter what you need to do.

At the end of the line, TSheets’ unparalleled customer service and support team serve to make the TSheets experience truly exceptional. We combine high-tech expertise with friendly real-world insight, so you can learn and understand how to make the best use of our technology by talking to an actual person, joining a weekly webinar, watching a how-to video, or finding a wealth of help online at www.TSheets.com.

Modern Feed aims to take all the technology guesswork out of finding and viewing legal tv shows, movies and other online programming.

The service discovers new shows, finds old shows, and keeps an eye out on programs that aren’t currently available but will be in the future.

funding_rounds.source_description: Ex-Googlers working on stealth social search

name: Aardvark
overview:
Aardvark (formerly Mechanical Zoo) is a social search engine, founded by a group of former Google employees. Aardvark that lets users ask questions that are distributed to the social graph for a quick and high quality answers. It launched into private beta in 2008.

Aardvark is a way to get quick, quality answers to questions from your extended social network. You can ask questions via an instant message buddy or email. The questions are then farmed out to your contacts (and their contacts) based on what they say they have knowledge of. If you ask taste related questions about music, books, movies, restaurants, etc., they’ll ask people who tend to show similar tastes as you in their profile.

Richard Chen has invested in Aardvark

name: PurpleTrail
overview:
Seattle based PurpleTrail is an event organizer that lets you create, invite and evolve plans along with your friends, colleagues and family.

Features Include:

  • Easy address book import with duplicate detection
  • All event details on one page
  • Comprehensive invite management & status tracking
  • Always stay connected using your mobile phone
  • Recurring events & reminders
  • Share event photos from one place
  • Easy updates on your desktop widget
  • Rich post event experience including thank you notes

PurpleTrail is also available on platforms other than the web. If you are the kind of person who enjoys a slick product on your PC, you are sure to enjoy the PurpleTrail Desktop Application that gives you access to all the great features of PurpleTrail without having to be glued to your browser. Much like the web interface, you are notified of all the viewpoints and discussions that happen in your event as they unfold in real time.

It is also available for your mobile device as both a standalone application in Symbian OS (a J2ME client is coming soon) as well as on your mobile web browser. The mobile browser interface makes efficient use of the limited space and capability of the browser to give you all the important information regarding your event in just a few screens. The standalone application keeps you informed about your event with instant notifications when you receive chat messages or updates.

Furthermore, the site also has a section called PartyTrail dedicated to party ideas & games. The section is complete with party ideas and neatly categorized and ordered by holidays and occasions. If you thought you weren’t impulsive, think again, because after reading an article or two you might just end up throwing a party!

name: JobScore
overview: The job hunt can be just as tough on employers as it is on prospective applicants. JobScore aims to provide a comprehensive solution to help facilitate the process. Employers can easily publish ads to all of the top career sites, and JobScore rates candidates by relevant criteria. Employers can also refer candidates to other members of the site (for a price, if they wish), further expediting the process.

Serious Business launched one of the first ever games on Facebook–Friends For Sale–which continues to top the Top 25 Games List and is one of the three first social games on the Facebook platform.

At Zigron, we devise modern software solutions by using cutting edge technologies like Java/J2EE, PHP, AJAX and methodologies like Agile Software Development.

The management team consists of people from Carnegie Melon University, Texas A&M University, Rochester Institute of Technology and University of Pittsburgh. They primarily worked in Fortune 500 companies like PNC Financial, Verizon and Goldman Sachs before starting Zigron.

Funded by River Cities Capital Funds, Hasso Plattner Ventures, Core Capital, and Hatteras Funds, KnowledgeTree is headquartered in Raleigh, NC.

name: Kabam
overview: Kabam is the leader in the western world for free-to-play core games with first and third party published titles available on mobile devices via the Apple Store, Google Play, Amazon Appstore, and on the Web via Facebook, Yahoo, Kabam.com and other platforms. In each of the last two years Kabam revenues have grown by 80 percent or more and will total more than $325 million in 2013. The company is profitable and has created four titles that, by the end of the year, will have grossed over $100M each in their life. Kabam’s Kingdoms of Camelot franchise has grossed more than $250 million in less than four years, making it one of the top 10 strategy franchises of all time. In 2012, Kabam Publishing was launched to provide third-party developers access to Kabam’s technology platform, distribution channels, data analytics and best practices that Kabam’s in-house development teams use to bring wildly successful games to players worldwide. Kabam has approximately 650 employees across three continents, with corporate headquarters in San Francisco. The company’s investors include Google, Warner Brothers, MGM, Intel, Canaan Partners, Redpoint Ventures, Pinnacle Ventures and others. More information about Kabam can be found at www.kabam.com.

InGameNow was founded by sfEntrepreneurs - an organization of ten San Francisco entrepreneurs who are equal investors, founders, and operators. Founders are from eBay, Apple, beRecruited and other local web 2.0 companies.

UNYK is a smart address book that allows users to keep all their contacts (Hotmail, Yahoo, Gmail, Outlook, etc.) in one place. It is automatically updated as soon as one of the user’s contacts changes his or her contact info on UNYK.com.

Contrary to social networking sites, only the user can see their own contacts. Accessible through the Web, the service gives users control and allows them to share their contact info quickly and automatically with the UNYK ID, assigned to every user.

Additionally, BioWizard has a direct interface with PubMed, which offers an optimized search experience, up-to-the-minute field-specific news, a comprehensive product directory and blogs from scientists.

name: Velocify
overview:
Velocify, formerly Leads360, is a market-leading provider of cloud-based intelligent sales software, designed for high-velocity sales environments. Velocify helps sales teams keep pace with the speed of opportunity and improve conversion rates by driving rapid lead response, increased selling discipline, improved productivity, and actionable selling insights.

The company has helped more than 1,500 companies across a variety of industries improve customer acquisition practices and sales performance. Velocify was recently recognized as one of the fastest growing companies in North America by Deloitte and a Best Place to Work by the Los Angeles Business Journal.

Velocify intelligent sales automation solution includes Velocify LeadManager™ and Velocify Dial-IQ™ to deliver the science to selling with clear, repeatable processes that can systematically accelerate performance.

Velocify LeadManager™ is an intelligent sales automation platform that empowers sales management to quickly deploy world-class selling and lead management strategies across sales team to ensure sales reps respond to leads faster than ever, boosting the number of activities your team is able to complete each day and taking the guesswork out of selling. With Velocify LeadManager, you can rest assured that salespeople are focused on the best opportunities, while ensuring no lead is left behind.

• Lead Capture and De-Dupe • Configurable Lead Scoring • Flexible Lead Distribution • Continuous Activity Prioritization • Automated Lead Nurturing • Real-Time Dashboard and Reporting

Velocify Dial-IQ™ brings incredible speed and efficiency to your sales team, dramatically improving time-to-contact, call volume, and productivity. Velocify Dial-IQ provides sales teams with a host of outbound dialing and inbound handling features to drive improved productivity, effectiveness, and sales conversion.

• Phone-Based Lead Routing • Outbound Cloud Dialing • Inbound Call Handling • Call Insights

name: PhaseWare
overview:
PhaseWare, founded in 2005, is a leading provider of Customer Service and Support software applications optimized for the Small and Medium Business (SMB) to deliver robust and financially viable solutions. There is a major distinction between installing software and implementing a solution.

PhaseWare enables companies to better manage their business processes, reduce operational expenses, and significantly increase the effectiveness and quality of customer service. The PhaseWare Tracker® suite of products is uniquely designed to accelerate implementation of the solutions, which are delivered in either an On-Site or Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model. PhaseWare provides a competitive advantage for the SMB to serve, support, retain, and maximize the value of every customer.

PhaseWare delivers its solution using an On-Site or Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model. Since the SaaS model does not require hardware or software installation and support, little to no IT involvement is necessary. Process integrations can be operational in days. PhaseWare solutions are financially viable for the smallest firm and robust enough for the largest firm.

Friend2Friend provides social media tools and software that enable brand marketers to deploy social engagement experiences and applications.

These social engagement experiences and applications cultivate brand communities; increase engagement; invite discovery of new products and services; spread brand awareness; and build new insights to gain a deeper understanding of fans and followers.

Friend2Friend provides these platform tools and software to leading global consumer brands and media agencies to deploy apps on Facebook and LinkedIn.

Friend2Friend is a Facebook Preferred Developer Consultant, a LinkedIn Certified Developer Partner, and has offices in Palo Alto, California and Barcelona, Spain. http://www.friend2friend.com.

name: allyve
overview:
Our All-in-One Social Media Software provides web businesses with the right tools and services to fully integrate sites and apps with the social web. Large companies like Siemens, Das Örtliche and Das Telefonbuch rely on our All-in-One API that covers 10 social networks including Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin. Our ability to deliver high-quality Social Plugins, like enabling users to login via their preferred social media profile, sharing content with one click in multiple social networks or amplifying website activity through gamification, makes websites more interactive and personalized than ever before. Additional Social Media Services empower web businesses to leverage the high quality data for their social media and online marketing activities. The benefits at a glance: driving conversion rates and user engagement, getting access to rich user profile data and boosting traffic through viral social media marketing.

Compliant with the German and European data privacy laws our Software-as-a-Service enables easy and innovative social media integration without having legal questions in mind.

name: Boardwalktech
overview:
Boardwalktech is a leading business process automation company. Our mission is to build and maintain competitive advantage for our clients by fostering business process innovation and automation.

Companies continue to fill the gaps in their enterprise application landscape using desktop tools because for the past twenty years, there has been little progress made in making traditional enterprise applications collaborative. This is due to the mismatch between the record-object world of traditional relational-database driven applications and the positional data environment of collaborative business applications which are often run in spreadsheets. Boardwalktech is changing the way enterprises work with collaborative data by providing a patented, positional data management technology which bridges the gap between the desktop and the extended enterprise .

We help companies improve business results by providing a next-generation technology platform that enables companies to automate existing and build new business processes using a library of business process templates integrated with your systems of record. Using spreadsheets and other tabular data management environments as the user interface “form” and the Boardwalk Collaboration Platform (BCP) as the collaborative data management backend, companies can enterprise enable business applications running them in the cloud or behind the firewall.

Boardwalktech offers an implementation process which can deploy in weeks, not months, enterprise quality business processes. And, since BCP is licensed not by process, we work with our customers to insure that they can deploy their own BCP-based processes to meet their ever expanding collaborative business process needs.

Boardwalktech is based in Palo Alto, California and is privately held.

name: Jobirn
overview:
The company goal of jobirn.com is to become the free real time platform for recruiters and hiring managers.

Jobirn.com was founded on observation of the following two issues in recruiting market.

  1. Ineffective communication channel - usually an e-mail based communication channel is costly to communicate in. There are long delays and lacks interaction. Video interview is something feasible technically, but not commonly available.

  2. Spams - Email based recruiting are subject to spams. Applicants are forced to send hundreds or thousands of copies of their resumes, given that response rate is so low. It’s very hard for recruiters to pick the right one.

Jobirn.com solution is a real time online system. Recruiters stay online most of the time, without logging to jobirn.com. All they need to do is to bundle their messenger with jobirn.

A video Interview comes handy, when they find qualified applicants, willing for a face-to-face conversation.

The strict Spam-Control policy protects recruiters from spam. Because it’s a chat-based system, applicants may not spam - if they are reported 3 times, their account will be closed.

A competitive point system overrides this all, and rewards members with privileges for achieving various milestones on the site.

Rootzoo ownership abandoned the site in the spring of 2010. The domain was purchased anonymously in December 2010.

name: BitRock
overview:
BitRock provides tools and services for packaging, deploying and updating software. Millions of end users have installed software packaged with InstallBuilder, a cross platform installer development tool which is used by hundreds of BitRock customers and open source projects throughout the world. BitRock also offers a full-service solution for providing software vendors with ready-to-run, easy to install packages of their applications and all of the third party software required to run it.

BitRock’s software as a service offering, the BitRock Network Service, allows software vendors to open a channel of communication to their users while getting better insight into their customer base to improve product development and support.

BitRock was founded in 2003 in Seville, Spain by Daniel Lopez Ridruejo and has offices in Seville, Spain and Alameda (San Francisco area), California. Customers include MySQL, JasperSoft, Funambol, KnowledgeTree, SugarCRM, Alfresco, OpenBravo, Pentaho, UserScape, SpikeSource, Zmanda, Intel, Qualcomm, Motorola, Novell, Telefonica, Montavista and many others.

BitRock is a Red Herring Global 100 Winner.

name: MyTickets
overview:
MyTickets has information on all events, large and small, mainstream and alternate, updated constantly. You can’t buy your tickets at MyTickets, but you will find out where to get the best tickets. And it’s free! No tricks. No hidden costs. Just all the information you need, at your fingertips. Australia’s largest online event guide

MyTickets lists all available ticket options to thousands of events being held all around Australia. What’s more, we give you member benefits, inspirational ideas (for those times when you want to go out but don’t know what you want to see) and helpful hints on how to get that elusive perfect seat.

MyTickets is more than a gateway to finding and buying tickets. It is the place to find out what’s on, where it’s on, and what it will cost. It is a place to be inspired, to have fun, to explore new ideas, and to find out what’s happening on the Australian event scene.

Attending events is fun, so the team at MyTickets want to make the experience of searching for tickets fun. We want you to be surprised and delighted, motivated and inspired.

Browse through the thousands of events on offer at MyTickets and let us know what you think. After all, MyTickets is for you, not us! It’s free!

Because MyTickets doesn’t sell tickets, it’s free. MyTickets is funded through sponsored advertisements on its site, so you can use MyTickets as often as you like for as long as you like. We won’t send you advertising material, or sell your email address either.

This word “razoo” is the root of what our business is all about– small actions coming together to change your life and to change your world.

Programs written in NOLOH free developers from having to worry about browser detection, AJAX, Search Engines, bookmarking, back button, or any of the usual issues one would have to worry about in a conventional Rich Internet Application.

Whether you are organising a free party for your friends, a ticketed conference for delegates or a reunion for old colleagues; EventElephant makes it easy to set up a great looking single or multi page event website, send out email invitations, and sign up online registrations and payments.

Using FLIMP, anyone can quickly launch engaging audiovisual email marketing campaigns that automatically track and report detailed viewer engagement and response data and by individual email address in a clear reporting dashboard.

Established in 2006, Flimp Media is a privately-funded company.

name: Fortisphere
overview:
Fortisphere, Inc. provides policy-based virtualization management (VM) software for virtualized environments. It also offers Virtual Essentials, a suite of virtualization management solutions that provide a visibility, control, and automation around the inventory, configuration, and policy-based management of virtual machines; Virtual Insight, an operational management product that automates the process of identifying, tagging, tracking, and reporting on virtual machines; and Virtual Foresight, a policy-based management product that enables the control of VMs. In addition, the company provides sprawl management, and discovery and assessment solutions. Fortisphere, Inc. has strategic partnership with Microsoft, Citrix, VMware, and bmc software.

The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Chantilly, Virginia with additional offices in Boston, Massachusetts; Glenwood, Maryland; and Washington, DC.

name: Cyloop
overview:
Cyloop is the first online social network community with unlimited access to on-demand music and video streams for fans and top artists, establishing a direct connection between them.

Cyloop features the biggest and most complete catalog from leading music labels and distributors to offer on-demand, interactive streaming of their audio and video catalogs in Spain, USA and Latin America, making it the main online destination of its kind.

The Cyloop experience features also exclusive content such as intimate interviews with the artists, in-studio live performances, behind the scenes footage, original shows, etc.

For Music Fans:

  • By registering free, Cyloop users can easily create their own “loops,” which are collections of songs, or playlists, available across all the registered profiles in the site.
  • Cyloop’s on-demand experience goes beyond regular “music streaming,” allowing users to select specific songs, go back, skip, or repeat as desired.
  • When a profile is created, users can start collecting their favorite songs in it, organize them using loops, and even share those loops with their friends in the community, or bring their friends’ loops into their profile. All endless ways to share an unlimited source of music using easy drag-&-drop quick steps.
  • Users’ profiles can be easily customized to their own preferences. They also can incorporate pictures, graphics, video, blogs, personal labels or any other parameters that define a user’s identity, so they can share it all with their friends in the community.
  • Cyloop profiles and Loops are also accessible via mobile at m.cyloop.com (WAP).

For Artists:

  • Musicians, performers, and bands can also easily create a profile uploading an unlimited number of their songs to share their music with all members of the community; and establish a direct connection with their audience.
  • Using Cyloop’s screening process, artists can safely register and upload their own content, ensuring its legitimacy within the community.
  • Cyloop’s Team assists in profile development, including rich graphic design customizations, and all artist-generated communications and updates.
  • Content distribution: Artists only need to manage their content in one place. The network of sites powered by Cyloop does the work of taking it to fans over multiple platforms, reaching audiences through leading internet portals across different countries and markets.
  • Additionally, artists can use powerful communication tools with their fans, keeping them up to date through easy-to-edit newsletters and calendar features for upcoming events, concerts, releases, announcements, bios, blogs, news, etc.
  • Cyloop’s own production facilities based in Miami, Buenos Aires and Spain generate premium quality music-centric content.

Cyloop is an advertiser sponsored site and being a member of Cyloop is free. Becoming a member as a music fan or artist is a free simple process, and requires no memberships, fees, hidden costs or charges of any kind. All available music streams and content can be shared endlessly and completely free among registered members of the community.

Cyloop.com is a division of Hoodiny Entertainment Group.

overview: After years of research, Zigabid has developed an innovative way to solve the disconnect between buyers and sellers. Zigabid is where consumers interact directly with each other to determine the price of a ticket.

name: Siteheart
overview:
Siteheart Inc. has developed a range of innovative solutions and web-services for e-commerce, online payments, and social web which could be used by any internet users to easily create and maintain online business, send and receive money, pay for goods and services, monetize blogs, web-sites and social network profiles, explore Web in a new and entertaining way, organize and share quotes, learn how to program online, conduct advertising campaigns, etc. Today Siteheart’s products include payment&communication system Siteheart.com, online payment system Liqpay.com, visual internet browsing engine Walk2Web.com, on-line programming education service CodeIDE.com, person-to-person social advertising system FolkAd.com, social quotation service Deepmemo.com, online-business nanoshops solution AgentNano.com.

SiteHeart.com - developed and implemented new concept of e-commerce called “Live Market” — an open environment for communication and making transactions. It is an innovative payment-communication system that provides Live communication through on-line dialogue between Seller and Customer, comfortable deal fixation, safe method of on-line and off-line credit card payments.

Liqpay.com online payment system created by Siteheart lets anyone safely send money using mobile phone and Internet all over the world. Liqpay is based on one-time password technology (OTP), which guarantees strong identification of sender, card fraud prevention and the highest level of security. Another cornerstone of Liqpay is person-to-person card-to-card money transfer technology (“P2P”), provided by international payment systems Visa and MasterCard worldwide for any Issuing Bank, which lets recipient withdraw money from Liqpay system directly to the payment card of any bank worldwide. Liqpay.com developed the engine which allows exchange money using only the mobile phone number linked to Liqpay virtual account. Mobile phone number=Liqpay’s user ID.

Deepmemo.com is a social quotation service, which makes it easy and quickly to save, manage and share information online (quotes, pieces of text and/or pictures). The idea of Deepmemo is that as long as people read the web, they have necessity to save interesting links, texts, pictures, quotes and then discuss it and share with friends. Deepmemo web-site has web 2.0 and social network functionality: user profiles, tags, blogs, communities, friends, RSS feeds etc. Deepmemo service is useful for active Internet surfers, who’d like to remember interesting quotes or create their own collection of quotes for later usage. It’s useful for journalists, bloggers, copywriters, and people, who work with texts, since Deepmemo can help find interesting quotes. Service can be of great help for students, scholars and scientists, who write a diploma or a thesis and often need a way to organize quotes. Deepmemo saves quotes with a link to original web-site and a screen shot, so it’s a comfortable way to create bibliography.

FolkAd.com person-to-person social advertising system lets people monetize their blogs and web-sites. One can register in system, get a code and to put it in a blog. Advertising banners will be displayed in this block. Blogger can himself set a price for advertising in his blog and receive money directly to his payment card. FolkAd.com easily links bloggers and advertisers and provides easy way of payments to each other. This is NOT banner exchange network, NOT context advertizing, but POINT, site-targeted, P2P — advertizing service.

AgentNano.com project developed by Siteheart allows people easily start online-business or monetize blog or social network profile. AgentNano provides a virtual storefront. It lets users create portable storefront and post it to a site, blog, MySpace profile or anywhere on web. Users can host item descriptions on AgentNano web-server, track items and sales, chat with customers, and accept person-to-person payments with taking money directly to payment card.

Walk2Web.com is a new way to explore web developed by Siteheart. Walk2web visualizes the connections between sites, allows viewing, reviewing, bookmarking and voting for favorite sites. One can find amazing connections and many interesting sites by taking a five minutes’ walk down the Internet’s lane.

CodeIDE.com is an on-line programming education service, which helps you to start programming in a various languages just entering the web-site online. It is simple and easy in use both for beginners and for professionals.CodeIDE.com is globally accessible (from any place in the world and from any browser with Internet connection), results of program running are displayed on-line. It provides wide opportunities of individual and team-work (multy-user project creating mode), WIKI-community, compilation of tasted programs to executable files to use in different operational system (Windows/DOS, Linux, etc.) and a lot more. CodeIDE.com has already launched tool for Schools and universities which allows providing education of programming languages in group with a teacher with tasks, ratings, evaluating, and teachers’ support functionality.

name: RCRD LBL
overview:
RCRD LBL is an online destination for free, curated, legal, MP3 downloads. RCRD LBL delivers free daily curated MP3’s, on its website, via its content partners, and directly to the user, on the “RCRD of the Day” daily email newsletter.

RCRD LBL launched in 2007, as a joint venture between Downtown Music LLC (Gnarls Barkley, Cold War Kids, Santigold), and online media pioneer Peter Rojas (Engadget, Gizmodo, Weblogs, Inc.), and was instantly regarded as a revolutionary force in the distribution of music online.

RCRD LBL features over 10,000 free singles, remixes, exclusive tracks and rarities from a diverse, handpicked roster of artists including Santigold, Steve Aoki, Moby, Massive Attack, MGMT and thousands more. Additionally RCRD LBL’s network of affiliated content partners includes such well respected labels as Warp Records, Ghostly International, Dim Mak, Fool’s Gold and Modular.

name: StatusNet
overview:
StatusNet, Inc is a Quebec corporation headquartered in Montreal with staff around the world. It develops the Open Source microblogging software, StatusNet. The best-known site running the software is Identi.ca.

Anyone can download StatusNet and run their own microblogging service, much like they can with traditional blogging platforms such as Wordpress or MoveableType. The company is pursuing a WordPress-like strategy by offering a cloud service for public and private microblogging sites.

name: Transinsight
overview:
Think the impossible… Develop Intelligent Search Technologies for the Life Sciences and Beyond.

Transinsight is a German based company providing solutions for knowledge based search. The award winning company works in close collaboration with the bioinformatics group of the Technical University Dresden. Transinsight and the bioinformatics group are co-located in a technology breeding building hosting groups dedicated to genomics, proteomics, biophysics, tissue engineering, cellular machines and bioinformatics.

name: BrightMix
overview: BrightMix develops web-based software solutions for businesses. They have a passion for creating elegant, easy-to-use, and well-thought-out web-based applications. As big advocates of Web 2.0 ideals, they use the latest and greatest web technologies to craft their products, like Ruby on Rails and ASP.NET.

name: Signal
overview: Signal is an easy to use platform for small businesses to manage, monitor and measure their marketing efforts. Think of Signal as a lightweight CRM, combined with cross-channel messaging (mobile, social and email) and customer acquisition tools (landing pages, promotions, etc).

name: Total Beauty Media
overview: Total Beauty Media is an online portal for women in search of beauty tips. The company also operates BeautyRiot, LimeLife, Modern Man (a joint venture with Break Media), and an ad network of 40 fashion blogs and women’s sites. It’s strategy is to bring together a woman’s audience appealing to cosmetics and beauty product advertisers.

name: inFlow Inventory Software
overview:
inFlow Inventory Software is an inventory system for small businesses to handle sales, purchasing, inventory control and management.

They’re a software company that believes that solid business software doesn’t have to be clunky and ugly. They are focused on creating powerful systems that are easy and intuitive to use.

name: Prolebrity
overview:
Prolebrity (a mix of the words ‘pro’ and ‘celebrity’) is a sports community founded by professional athletes and dedicated to connecting them directly to other athletes, fans and the business community for networking purposes and to enable athletes to promote their off the field interests, including business ventures, charitable events and causes they support, public appearances, etc.

Prolebrity’s mission is to assist professional athletes connect and communicate with each other more easily, privately and securely than ever before, while at the same time enable them reach out to their entire fan base and the business community in a safe and trusted interactive environment.

name: Praxis Language
overview: Praxis Language produces technology platforms (web/mobile) and learning materials for the language-learning industry. Building on our global success with our ChinesePod product, we also target three distinct market segments in the multi-billion-dollar, language-learning industry in China.

funding_rounds.source_description: Wrapping the Israeli internet scene in 2007

overview: Reimage® is a world leader of internet-based system repair solutions. We are a multinational company with our business headquarters in Nicosia, Cyprus; and part of Market.COM, a one stop shop e-commerce solutions provider including payment processing and risk management, online marketing and advertising as well as custom website development and online shop design.

name: Arkiva
overview:
With Arkiva you can store, access, and share any type of digital files in one place.

Including Photos, Videos, Music, PC Files, Scanned Images, and more. Users also get advanced email, Home Inventory Software, and Medical Record Software.

Arkiva will also convert any old media such as Videotapes, Film, Photo Prints, Slides, Negatives, Record Albums, Cassettes, or Documents to digital. Arkiva customers get a premium DVD and a copy stored in digital format on their personal arkiva account.

name: GEN247
overview:
GEN247 is a media production company that specializes in integrating web TV content with alternate reality games, also known as cross platform entertainment or immersive gaming.

In 2008, the company produced DELETED: THE GAME, an original web series conspiracy thriller that was integrated with an ARG (Alternate Reality Game). The formula was a hit with audiences and won two nominations at the 13th Webby Awards for Best Experimental Online Video and Best Use of Interactive Video. DELETED: THE GAME won the former and was honored for the latter beating the likes of MTV, Sundance Channel and Channel 4.

GEN247 continues to develop its slate of interactive web originals as branded platforms. Its website shows a range of titles, with descriptions and trailers, that target niche audiences.

funding_rounds.source_description: Techcrunch UK
Wahanda Secures $5.5 Million From Fidelity Growth Partners Europe

name: Wahanda
overview:
Wahanda is a health, beauty and wellness community & marketplace that connects consumers, wellness businesses and professionals through content, community ratings & reviews and commerce.

Wahanda is a Native American word meaning ‘great spirit and creator’.

By providing a comprehensive, and growing list of global spa, health, beauty & wellness options (from massages & facials to yoga, pilates and even botox and cosmetic surgery), Wahanda allows consumer the ability to learn about treatments, read and contribute ratings & reviews, and ultimately transact by booking online with businesses and independent therapists.

Founded by veterans of lastminute.com (a Travelocity company) and Yahoo Search, Wahanda has brought together investors behind some of the leading businesses in the internet and hospitality industries, including Ambient Sound Investments (the investment firm created by the former founding engineers at Skype), Brent Hoberman (co-Founder of lastminute.com), Stefan Glaenzer (Former Executive Chairman of last.fm) and Wolf Hengst (Former President of Worldwide Operations, Four Seasons Hotels & Resorts).

description: simple email marketing for small busines

CakeMail helps small businesses

  • Build their contact list
  • Create slick emails in a snap
  • Save time with simple tools
  • Track their results immediately

name: LingusTV
overview:
Lingus.TV is a television channel for the new generation devoted to teaching and disseminating languages, while taking advantage of all the social characteristics of the Internet.

In the new era of communication, LingusTV is unique, as a result of its very specific and focused way of teaching language. We are a web TV channel devoted to education and believe that the entertainment and active participation of students are the keys to communication in a new language.

Lingus.TV was founded in beta in June 2008 using this method of learning Spanish as a first step to building a network of thematic channels. The situation comedy (sitcom), “5 y acción,” is our first production, and guiding principle for our system of teaching Spanish.

name: Open Box
overview:
Open Box provides unique software solutions for companies whose needs surpass that of which can be found in a box or on the shelf.

Open Box is a Vancouver-based, award-winning custom software development company that understands your business needs, delivers on time and on budget and is willing to guarantee that in our contracts.

They specialize in working with small to medium enterprises that have revenues above 1 million and where an off-the-shelf solution will not meet the company’s needs.

Every company needs ways to leverage their spending and increase revenue. Our custom software solutions:

  • Help you capitalize on new opportunities
  • Increase staff and customer satisfaction
  • Improve operational efficiencies
  • Increase revenue for each unit of expense

funding_rounds.source_description: CITA Gestion invests in YOOWALK for 3D Web

name: YOOWALK
overview: Yoowalk offers a breaking edge innovation that allows advertisers to interact with their targeted audience. Its users are immersed into a 3D representation of the web as a virtual world, where they enjoy playful surfing for making new friends, chatting, thematic window shopping and sharing interests in easily customizable spaces. Yoowalk is the first virtual world accessible with a single click. It requires no download, nor registration to walk around, recommend and share content. It is completely free for visitors and members.

name: Linkool Labs
overview:
Linkool Labs’ goal is to evolve the semantic web by making the web browser a smarter, more powerful tool for web users. Our first consumer product, Juice, is both a software product and an intelligent, on-demand web service that provides rich and contextually relevant information to web users — delivered in a way that enhances, without disrupting, web users’ browsing experience.

Contextually relevant information delivered by Juice is based on Linkool Labs’ proprietary, multilingual intelligent discovery engine. This proprietary engine, comprised of a natural language processing system and a dictionary management system, intelligently connects the keywords with the most relevant information from high quality web services.

Founded in 2005, Linkool Labs is a Beijing-based software developer funded by angel investors in Silicon Valley.

name: Swades Solutions

Swades team is experienced, professional and committed to bring the highest quality Products & Services in Information Technology anywhere, anytime and at a reasonable price.

name: GigMaven
overview:
GigMaven is a marketplace where aspiring musicians and live music venues can book gigs online. GigMaven launched in beta in early 2008 in conjunction with GigFest ‘08, GigMaven’s 1st annual charity music festival.

GigMaven is privately funded and based in the East Village of New York City.

name: TRSR Software
overview: TRSR Software provides outsourced product/project maintenance, support services, In-house product development, advertising services and consultancy services. We synergize technology and potential with low-cost-based global software development. Our in-house research initiatives complement our focus on our niche software product development proficiency.

name: Scavenja
overview:
Scavenja is an online, photo based scavenger hunt. Time limited games challenge players to complete thematically connected goals. Players post pictures to document completed goals and goals are awarded points based on difficulty level. Game play combines social interaction with competition and prizes are awarded to top players. Games can be designed to appeal to various interests.

A player creates an account to participate in games and track their progress in them. They can also track each games’ overall progress and will eventually be able to post comments on other players’ pictures.

Scavanja is a real world scavenger hunt that is delivered online.

name: Tripy Travel
overview: Tripy Travel is a service-oriented company that provides information to travelers around the world about the places they want to go with information submitted by other travelers.

name: Zendesk
overview:
Zendesk provides an integrated on-demand helpdesk - customer support portal solution based on the latest Web 2.0 technologies and design philosophies.

The product has an elegant, minimalist design implemented in Ruby on Rails and provides seamless integration of the back-end helpdesk SaaS to a company’s online customer-facing web presence, including hosted support email-ticket integration, online forums, RSS and widgets. This is unusual, because most SaaS helpdesk solutions focus exclusively on the backend helpdesk and treat the Web as an afterthought.

The system also leverages Web 2.0 ideas on the backend, such as tag based categorization throughout instead of the usual pre-defined drop down lists, RSS feeds for every customized view and a complete REST/JSON API for virtually every entity in the system.

With their security services, maintenance and remote management you can keep their business information updated in real time optimizing decision making safely Because it is necessary to make informed decisions at the right time, AtelMedia Solutions focuses on providing its customers control tool, monitoring, security, management and tracking that can be consulted and managed from anywhere in the world for having accessibility through mobile devices.

With their solutions tailored to their business, the users have an agile and efficient company that moves at the pace of today’s world. In a changing world where technological innovations they are bombarded with new ideas is not very easy to get lost and enjoy the benefits that these proposals can bring to their lives. So AtelMedia Domotics focuses on providing a connected home concept easy to use and really is heading to give us an atmosphere of comfort and trust in our homes.

With their advice the users can make their space perfect smart and make the most of the daily activities they do.

MUZU TV protects the rights of music on the site and generates income by a shared advertising revenue with the music content owners including unsigned artists.

name: Fraktal
overview:
Fraktal is the creator of Edicy.com, a simple web editing software. Fraktal was founded in late 2007 by some of the key figures at the founding of Skype (Toivo Annus and Märt Kelder) plus high profile web-specialists (Tõnu Runnel and Priit Haamer).

Fraktal is developing a new type of web service called Edicy, with which it is easy for everyone to quickly build a business website from scratch without outside help.

name: Expertsoft
overview:
ExpertSoft specializes in creating software to assist building companies.

The company has two large offices in Ukraine and representatives in almost every region of the country.

name: Comindwork
overview:
Online environment and tools for knowledge workers collaboration in projects.

Comindwork is an online environment and set of tools for effective and convenient collaborative work of knowledge workers. It contains many Web 2.0 (Enterprise 2.0) tools, which are easily mastered by new users: wiki pages, blogs, tasks, documents, search, tags, associations etc. Comindwork also provides new ways to integrate these tools specifically for the tasks of project management and intensive collaboration.

What can I do with project in Comindwork?

  • Invite your project team and assign their project roles
  • Have informal discussion on project issues and ideas using project blog
  • Create your project milestones and responsible people
  • Define your tasks and update each task with comments as it progresses
  • Store project specifications, standards and conventions in wiki and create tag clouds
  • Upload all documents related to your project and manage it centrally
  • Track task time for client billing with the timesheets
  • Get notified by email when a case is assigned to you or when milestone is approaching
  • Monitor daily activities and personal contribution with history
  • Search for relevant information in your project tasks, milestones, blogs, wiki pages and comments
  • See comprehensive charts on your project status and progress
  • Update your project visibility settings and availability for external users and clients
  • Use RSS to subscribe to all project changes and be aware about the progress

name: Come2Play
overview:
Come2Play is a developer of innovative white-label social gaming platforms for multiplayer online flash games. The company offers players, game developers, web site and blog owners and advertisers the next generation of social gaming.

Come2Play’s revolutionary and exclusive platform allows casual game developers to easily create, enrich, distribute and monetize multiplayer Flash games, and enables website and blog owners to create a social gaming network with channels, applications and widgets.

Our advanced platform is free, simple and user-friendly allowing users, together with their friends, the ultimate gaming experience bringing together the most recent and popular features in the online casual games market.

name: ArtistForce
overview:
ArtistForce creates technology solutions for the live entertainment industry.

The company’s first offering — ArtistForce.com, is a web-based relationship management platform and professional marketplace. Industry professionals use ArtistForce.com to interact, negotiate and manage business deals on a common SaaS platform. Products under development include business intelligence applications for live entertainment commerce. ArtistForce offers business software, intelligence, consulting, IT and outsourcing services specifically designed for live entertainment.

name: Kazzong
overview:
Kazzong is a decentralised, direct-to-fan music distribution system in the Web 2.0 age.

Music fans can discover, listen and comfortably purchase music via Kazzong widgets. Users are able to create their own Kazzong Players with their favourite music. These players can be placed on community profiles and websites. Artists and labels are provided with a fast and simple promotion and distribution tool for their music. Kazzong widgets allow artists to present themselves online wherever there is attention by music buyers and potential fans.

name: Playza
overview:
Playza is an online games company which creates customised virtual worlds for the social networking generation.

By embedding multiplayer games into the playza.com portal, we can combine the addictive nature of online gaming with the community features of a social networking portal. As the central Playza game can be played via the Web, on mobile phones and uniquely within social networking sites, our plans are to grow Playza into world’s largest multiplayer casual game within a 3 year period.

name: InterActive Applicant
overview:
InterActive Applicant provides a web-based multimedia screening solution.

InterActive Applicant solutions enable recruiters and employers to reduce recruitment time and cost through the use of a Multimedia Candidate Screening System.

Using webcam technology, recruiters can see and hear applicant responses to job/industry specific questions before first interviews.

Rouxbe is the web’s first-ever online video cooking school complete with practice video recipes, cooking exercises, culinary quizzes, progress reporting and personal chef support.

The Rouxbe Cooking School launched in 2008 and has home cook students in over 200 countries.

name: BetterLabs
overview: BetterLabs incubates products for early stage startup founders with an unique model that allows rapid development, iteration and launch at significantly low investment. BetterLabs is invested in the success of the product with a cash and equity engagement model. BetterLabs is a new way for startup founders to get started quickly with very little investment, along the lines of YCombinator, TechStars or betaworks. BetterLabs is privately funded and is based in Silicon Valley, California and Pune, India.

Spring is a technology consultancy that helps build applications that connect people, enable conversations and drive transactions.

Services

Customized website/web applications development

  • Content managed websites built using Drupal or WordPress
  • Customized content management systems (CMS) using the CodeIgniter or symfony frameworks
  • Rich Internet Applications built with Adobe Flash technology
  • Video and Audio enhanced web sites
  • Intranets that use social media

Outsourced web development services With this service you can have a dedicated team work on your website/web application for lengthy periods of time for implementing new features, maintenance and performance tuning tasks.

Web strategy consulting We help you set a web/digital strategy for your business, new services you can offer online, how to use social media to communicate with your audience/customers. What your competitors are doing online and how you can differentiate your online existence.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Assessment of the current search engine performance of your website

name: Jibes
overview: Jibes offers software to enable end-users to create enterprise mashups and situational applications. Mixing enterprise data with external/internet data to create new applications is a key feature of Jibes mashup software.

name: LifePsychic
overview: LifePsychic is an online advice company. LifePsychic connects advice seekers to advice givers through VOiP (Voice Over the Internet Protocol) Technology. LifePsychic is a psychic network designed for people who have questions regarding their past, present, and future. Lifepsychic advisors are trained professionals, who will be able to give the users the answers they need. LifePsychic offers you the chance to get the answers to the questions you thought you may never have the answers to.

funding_rounds.source_description: Daniel S. Loeb

name: Code71
overview:
Code71 helps startups, small, and mid-sized enterprises with developing and supporting on-demand software (SaaS) running on on-demand platform (cloud computing) using its on-demand service (Agile/Scrum).

Whether a client needs to build a solution from scratch or build it from integrating COTS (commercial/open source off-the-shelf) products, Code71 can do it all. Whether a client needs to bridge the gap between processes, or a comprehensive solution to create a fully integrated business process system, it can help. Code71 is your trusted IT specialist. It has developed a Web-based project management and collaboration tool called ScrumPad (www.scrumpad.com) to deliver its client projects using Agile/Scrum. ScrumPad is also commercially available for others to use.

Code71 is located in Richmond, VA, with an off-shore development center in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It uses on-shore + off-shore hybrid model to help clients plan, design, build, and maintain Web applications. They are specialize in building Web 2.0 solutions using Ruby On Rails, .Net/MS Platform, PHP, Java, and Open Source software and tools.

funding_rounds.source_description: Founders

name: OpenDrive
overview:
OpenDrive, which started as a virtual drive in 2008 during past few years became a multiplatform solution for online storage, syncing, backup and cloud content management.

OpenDrive’s strategy is not only to be a online storage, backup and syncing software, but also a centralized solution with integration of storage, apps and services such as tasks, social networks, project management within single interface to create uniform experience accessible from anywhere.

Beyond the unique services like selling files, advertising files, a file search engine, direct hotlinking, and API, as well as its virtual drive and virtual desktop applications, OpenDrive provides sharing, syncing, online editing, file collaboration, file versioning and other features to allow the user manage cloud content smarter and faster than ever before.

name: Wuala
overview:
Wuala is a great way to get secure online storage. Users can automatically backup, sync, store, share, and access files online. Wuala has a unique security concept: unlike other online storage services all files are encrypted directly on the user’s computer, and the password is never transmitted. No one unauthorised - not even Wuala - can access the user’s files. Wuala is based on novel technology that was researched at ETH Zurich (Swiss Federal Institute of Technology) in Switzerland.

Wuala is developed and run by LaCie AG in Zurich. Wuala joined LaCie, a French provider of external storage devices, in 2009 to work on the future of cloud storage.

name: teclogy
overview:
Teclogy is a global service provider of outsourced software development and Process outsourcing services.

Teclogy clients include software providers, E-commerce businesses, and enterprise organizations seeking to better leverage their software assets, to uphold on top among the customers, and reduce cost of stakeholder.

Tee-clogy services Commerce businesses solutions, Application development services, Product engineering , Application outsourcing, Enterprise application integration, Customer product support, Datawarehouse & business intelligence, Software Quality Assurance Testing, Intellectual Property Consultancy and Knowledge process outsourcing

funding_rounds.source_description: fbFund: Drumroll, please...

name: IBTgames
overview:
IBTgames is a social media gaming company on the web.

IBT develops and publishes innovative casual games on social networks including Facebook, Myspace, Bebo , Friendster, Orkut, and Hi5. In the future, IBT will launch on mobile platforms such as the iPhone and Android.

IBTgames is all about redefining the user experience in the social application world by harnessing the power of social networks. All of the applications are developed by experts in game theory and game design with the overall user experience in mind. By adding ease and simplicity to casual gaming applications, IBT allows its users to be happy and engaged while interacting with their friends.

name: Kazulo
overview:
Kazulo is a new portuguese web2.0 portal, developed by the web agency Elemento Digital. Kazulo entered beta status in August 2007, and already provides the portuguese community many features and content.

It has a social-bookmarking service, a tagged directory, forums, and several nich content channels (travel, fitness, nostalgia, wedding, erotica, etc), and some expert blogs.

The portal is based on the Web 2.0 concepts, from User Generated Content, to Tagging and Ajax.

During the beta phase, Kazulo will provide personalization features and social-networking tools for the users in order to develop the community.

name: FoodCare
overview:
FoodCare’s mission is to transform the dietary well being of America by providing nutrition-related apps and services to consumers, health-related technology companies, healthcare providers and foodservice businesses. The company provides enterprise class Nutrition Insight solutions to restaurants, food manufacturers, corporate and school cafeterias, senior living communities and Registered Dietitians.

Led by an experienced team of professionals with a diverse set of backgrounds including: healthcare, foodservice, branding/agencies, technology startups and management consulting FoodCare has revolutionized the use of easy-to-use web technologies.

Founded in February 2012, the business is headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, the nation’s leading center for age-related healthcare research and innovation.

name: Douban
overview:
Douban is a SNS featuring “lifestyle & culture” as its theme. It was initially launched in March 2005 as a review sharing platform for books, movies and music, and has developed into a prominent SNS provider.

Douban aims at helping urban people reveal the beauty of life using its desktop & mobile products. Douban’s core users are well-educated urbanites, including white-collar workers and college students.

Douban generates its income from advertising, interactive marketing and channel fee of book e-commerce.

Douban has raised over US$60,000,000 through three series of funding in 2006, 2009 and 2011.

Douban has seen steady growth in the past few years, reaching over 100 million users in 2012. Its primary products include Douban FM, Douban Reading and Douban Movie.

name: MapVersa

name: Samfind
overview:
samfind Bookmarks Bar is a Firefox add-on that personalizes your browser with the websites you interact with regularly, and brings social, search and RSS to the Bookmarks Toolbar. Available for download as an add-on for Firefox the software gives you control of your browser’s bookmarks based on your needs.

You can use samfind Bookmarks Bar to customize your web experience.

  • Be social with Digg, Reddit, Facebook, Twitter or any of about 40 others.
  • Search any and all of your favorite websites directly from the Bar.
  • RSS feeds at your fingertips for the websites that matter to you.
  • Customize every aspect of the Bar, the websites, its placement and layout.

name: Hyperrig
overview: Hyper Rig is a global provider of trading risk management software, and data management software technologies. We enable you to create solutions that set a new standard for reliability, speed, flexibility, and scalability across your enterprise.

name: StyleCard

StyleCard is a Web 2.0 interface that allows users the ability to create high-quality personal profile cards online.

In the ever evolving world of social networking, a StyleCard can be a valuable utility for sharing personal or professional information.

funding_rounds.source_description: Opposing Views raises $1.25M to explain complicated issues

name: Opposing Views
overview: Opposing Views, Inc. is an online media platform for people who enjoy digging deeper into the news each day. Opposing Views condenses the news into core issues and hosts well-known authorities and opinion leaders in its new and unique debating format as they state their cases, disagree with one another and defend their positions. Anyone can weigh in on the arguments, join in a debate or start one of their own.

name: EffectiveUI
overview:
Founded in 2005, EffectiveUI is an award-winning user experience agency that specializes in the creation and implementation of custom Web, mobile, desktop and touch-enabled applications.

EffectiveUI merges innovative technologies with expertise in user experience research, strategy, design and development to help today’s most respected brands deepen customer engagement through more exceptional software experiences. The company’s applications deliver competitive advantages, increase customer satisfaction and loyalty and produce measurable results.

Kenya is an upcoming outsourcing country, workforce is motivated, meticulously eager to be trained and with English as one of the two first languages. Our main focus is Subtitling, Proof Reading, Data Entry, Voice to Text, Data Mining, Document Cleansing and Document Conversion. We are already medium sized but intend to grow to a workforce of 1500+ employees. We are currently privately owned by a dutch investor.

name: Gopher
overview:
Gopher is a digital advertising company helping small/medium businesses to get found online.

They were founded in New Zealand 5 years ago by two tech-entrepreneurs and now are also now present in Australia and Indonesia.

Gopher offers a range of digital advertising solutions to small businesses who want more business, from a directory offering, mobile, Google AdWords and social media.

Gopher are offical Google Premier Small Business Partners (PSP) in both NZ and Indonesia. At the time of publication, Gopher were the first and only PSP in Indonesia.

funding_rounds.source_description: Huddler Launches White-Label Platform To Revamp Online Forums

name: Huddler
overview: Huddler is an innovative digital media company that powers millions of daily interactions on the internet’s most influential enthusiast communities. Huddler’s proprietary technology platform makes these communities more engaging for consumers and marketers alike. Huddler offers brands the opportunity to interact with over 24 million passionate consumers in a contextually relevant environment across key interest areas including parenting, fashion and beauty, consumer tech and outdoor sports. Marketers can engage the community through highly targeted advertising campaigns, brand ambassador programs and unique market research opportunities. Huddler is a privately held company based in San Francisco.

name: Orbius
overview:
Orbius provides a configurable enterprise-grade social media community platform and eco-system where brands and marketers can be safe for the fraction of the cost of other high-end solutions.

Orbius is designed for businesses, brands, small-medium groups (product-centric, departments and projects) within enterprises, as well as social groups and organizations such as: non-profits, associations, charities, alumni, PTAs and golf clubs. The Orbius community solution enables the brand or organization to better interact and engage with each other. We supplement existing websites with seamlessly integrated community functionality. Orbius can also be configured as a complete new website with community features.

Orbius is a highly configurable community solution that requires no IT involvement to setup or make changes and adjustments. We provide the functional equivalent of high-end custom white label community solutions at a fraction of the cost. In addition, the Orbius Idea Factory™ enables you use crowd sourcing techniques for innovation and idea storming.

Orbius’s key strength is the governance system that enables a community owner to setup an exacting ontology of the community’s organizational structure. The Orbius Ask the Expert functionality enables discussions to be better contextualized by providing a group of “experts” to be the first to respond and control the context and tone of discussions. This offers greater comfort to community owners for community moderation and management. Users are able to share only what they want with whom they want with multiple personas and various types of member connections. We make it safe to be connected with anybody!

name: Prezi
overview:
Prezi is a cloud-based presentation software that opens up a new world between whiteboards and slides. The zoomable canvas makes it fun to explore ideas and the connections between them. The result: visually captivating presentations that lead your audience down a path of discovery.

Prezi was officially launched in 2009 by co-founders Adam Somlai-Fischer, Peter Halacsy and Peter Arvai.

Adam Somlai-Fischer is an internationally renowned architect and visual artist who has been working with zooming presentations since 2001. Adam found that a zoomable user interface (ZUI) enabled him to explore the “big picture” overview of a floor plan and then zoom into the detail of individual rooms. Because there was no commercially-available zooming presentation editor, each presentation had to be coded by hand. Audiences were wowed and approached Adam to discover what presentation software he used. A few persuaded him to give them access to his code. Finally, in 2007, Budapest University of Technology professor Peter Halacsy convinced Adam to develop an editor so that anyone could make zooming presentations. After creating a prototype, they recruited a business-minded entrepreneur, Peter Arvai, to join as CEO to help them build a product and a company. Prezi was launched in April 2009 from Budapest, leading to investments from TED Conferences and Sunstone Capital. The San Francisco office was established in November 2009.
