overview:
GoAnimate enables people to produce a wide range of custom videos – from scratch – in the cloud – using drag-and-drop tools.

Businesses and educators recognize the power of video but find it difficult, time-consuming and expensive to produce high-quality content. GoAnimate is the quickest, simplest, and most cost-effective solution for producing and sharing a professional-looking video.

GoAnimate provides libraries with thousands of assets, including characters, actions, backgrounds, props, music tracks and sound effects. More of these assets are being added all the time. However, if you want to import your own audio, images, video or flash files, GoAnimate provides a simple import tool.

GoAnimate also provides “Starters,” which are pre-made sequences which help users get started (or finished!) quickly. For those on a really tight deadline, there are also “Templates,” which enable the creation of simple, dialog-based scenes in a matter of minutes.

Finished videos can be downloaded as mp4 files, in HD or Full HD resolution, or exported directly to a number of partners, such as YouTube. Business subscriptions also include unlimited hosting and playback, whether from the GoAnimate site or via easily copied embed codes.

Founded by CEO Alvin Hung in 2007, GoAnimate has served more than five million registered users worldwide and employs approximately 20 employees in the Bay Area and Hong Kong.

overview:

Hunch creates a taste profile by asking them a series of questions which range from serious to profound and subsequently can make recommendations personalized to that user, which live in “topics”.

Topics vary widely, from entertaining subjects like ‘Which superhero would you be’ to more conventional questions like ‘Should I Switch to A Mac?’ The system then uses the answers to these questions to offer the user a suggested solution, a “hunch” of what the user would like.

Xero is listed on the New Zealand Stock Exchange and the Australian Securities Exchange. It has over 200,000 users and paying customers in more than 100 countries. Xero is most active in New Zealand, Australia, the United Kingdom, and the United States.

Xero’s Software as a Service business model where software is hosted on the Internet as an innovative means of supplying solutions to large fragmented markets such as small businesses. Xero releases new features approximately every month. Additions and extensions to functionality are developed in response to the needs of new customers and new industries.

Xero is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner. The Xero software is developed using Microsoft’s .NET development environment, over a multi-tenanted SQL Server 2008 database, on a Windows 2008 production server infrastructure. Our production servers are hosted by Rackspace, a tier-one NASDAQ listed hosting provider, which monitors our servers and firewalls 24/7/365 at guarded facilities. Xero has also implemented a global Content Delivery Network with Akamai for faster application delivery to customers around the world.

We have made a significant investment in this global production hosting platform, providing it with the capacity for future growth and ensuring security of customer data.

In 2009, Xero won two Webby Awards for world-class software usability and design. In 2012, Xero was a recipient of the Fast Company Innovation by Design Award in the Service Design category.

name: SkyGrid
overview:
SkyGrid is a real-time web service that keeps people up-to-date on the things they care about. It is located in Sunnyvale, California and is operated and privately owned by SkyGrid, Inc.

In April 2010, SkyGrid launched on the Apple iPad with an application to browse and share streams of news. People use SkyGrid to receive updates on trending news and to follow their personal interests.

SkyGrid’s name comes from the combining the word “Sky” representing a vast limitless space and “Grid” a simple way to organize an unlimited amount of information.

SkyGrid was founded by Kevin Pomplun, in 2005 when he was 22 years old.

SkyGrid began building technology to create a way for people to see what information was traveling the fastest. As a result of this, Pomplun invented Information Velocity and was issued a United States Patent Aug 23, 2007. SkyGrid began as a real-time search service, then licensed it to the financial market, and now has returned to its original use to provide updates on information people are interested in.

In January 2011, SkyGrid announced the launch of SkyGrid Groups; a service that connects people with the music artists, brands, and public figures they are passionate about.

Groups is a new social forum; connecting the conversations people are having all over the web — on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and hundreds of other places — in one place. For ex, music artists use Groups to connect with fans who are excited about an upcoming show. Brands use Groups to connect with customers who are excited about a new product. Public figures use Groups to connect with voters who are excited about akey issue in their community. Even humanitarian causes are now using Groups to connect with people who want to help.

name: PX Interactive
overview:
PX Interactive are developers of the NetDog networking engine for MMOs and Virtual Worlds.

Netdog is positioned as a high performance toolset for game developers and virtual world designers. As such, primary features include load balancing and load distribution tools, seamless world functionality, performance optimization tools, and an intuitive interface that is easy to learn and customize.

NetDog has two major features. First, NetDog is fully cross-platform - developers will be able to create games that can be played across PC, Mac, PS3, Xbox 360, and even iPhone. Network messages will work regardless of the platform, bringing more gamers into each game, and providing unique gameplay options.

Second, NetDog’s architecture is built on a patent-pending distributed networking solution. With small setting changes NetDog can be used in a variety of network topologies - from full client server mode to fully peer-to-peer, with a variety of network computing options in-between. Developers will have the option to off-load some or all of their game processing to the clients in their network, and can choose which functions and events will be handled where. This will allow for bigger, more efficient networks with lower latencies

PX Interactive overview PX Interactive is led by a team of technologists and game industry veterans with entrepreneurial experience. The company’s objective is to become the top player in the defined niche of high-speed networking for 3D worlds. As such, they are targetting game developers and virtual world designers of all sizes.

name: Connective Logic
overview:
Connective Logic has created the Blueprint software development platform which, along with our real-time middleware, enables software developers to design, code generate and deploy very complex multi-core software applications without requiring expertise in the field of “multi-threaded” software.

Developing software to fully exploit multi-core CPUs is technically challenging and current development tools in the market are widely acknowledged to be inadequate.

Blueprint enables software that scales out over any number of CPU cores and networked computers, and ensures optimal load balancing and CPU utilisation.

Blueprint delivers significant reductions in software development costs, dramatically reduces time-to-market, lowers software development risk, improves application performance, safeguards investment in existing sequential code, reduces dependency on scarce multithreading experts and significantly reduces lock-in to operating systems and hardware platforms.

Blueprint and its underlying middleware are unique in the market place. The middleware has been proven in very demanding production systems within the UK Defence Industry.

Lyft community drivers are background-checked and interviewed to offer the best ride experience in the city! Lyft is currently available in San Francisco, LA, San Diego, Seattle, Chicago, Boston, and Washington, DC.

relationships.title: Member Of The Board Of Directors

name: Shattered Reality Interactive
overview:
Shattered Reality was founded in 2006 with the mission of creating online social immersive worlds, that are engaging, epic, and easy to understand whether the game is serious or casual. The big original vision was to create a theme based Massive Multiplayer Online Game that could be played in 5-10 minute time increments anytime, from anywhere.

Today popular online games, like World of Warcraft and Everquest, allow players to explore large and vast fantasy worlds, however they require huge time commitments and are considered “isolated” in their walled gardens. The games created by Shattered Reality provide “theme-based” and “hit-based” accomplishment for both the hardcore and casual gamers. What’s great about us is that we leverage the hardcore gaming production values and bridge the gap for online social games.

The first title to be released is, Legends of Kaos (LoK), a free 2 play multiplayer ancient sci-fi fantasy that combines the head-to-head play, collectability and trading associated with virtual powers and collectible action items. We also leverage level advancement and character development of massively multi-player games (MMORPGs) with the ease of access and community aspects of Web “two-point-oh” applications. LoK will also be available on Facebook and Myspace. LoK and other games developed by Shattered Reality are free 2 play. Players have the option to trade or sell items to other players and they can even sign up for VIP memberships for a small subscription fee.

description: Provides auto loans and car loans
name: NationWide Auto Lending
overview:
Nationwide Auto Lending is the name you can rely upon when it comes to auto loans. Enjoy the privilege of owning your dream car with speedy and hassle free online auto financing coordinated at Nationwide Auto Lending. We specialize in bad credit auto loans and bad credit auto financing in all 50 states with our local approval centers for auto loans.

Nationwide Auto Lending specializes in arranging fast and cheap auto loans as well as car loans for the residents of U.S. Our goal is to help people with bad credit, poor credit and bankruptcy find the affordable financing. We offer bad credit auto loans, auto financing after bankruptcy at the most competive rates and terms anywhere..

name: GazoPa
overview: GazoPa is an image search engine by Hitachi that uses features from an image to search for and identify similar images. There are abundant quantities of images on the web, however many of these simply cannot be described by keywords, keywords are not sufficient as conditions for image searches. Since GazoPa uses image features such as a color or a shape to search other similar images, a vast range of images can be retrieved from the web. In addition to images found using keyword searches, GazoPa enables the use of users’ own photos and drawings, and images found on the web, as search keys to locate similar images. GazoPa can support not only photo but also the search of video thumbnail. GazoPa lets users find favorite video from similarity of video thumbnail.

name: Wevod
overview:
Wevod is a french company, based in Paris, that provides B2B online video plateform to simplify WebTV management.

In november 2006, Wevod launch a public video-mail portal : www.mailemotion.tv

Mailemotion is a free service made for everyone to send videos via email. Mailemotion is accessible form anywhere on the internet at the address : www.mailemotion.tv. It does not require any software installation and is compatible on all existing platforms. Simple and intuitive, the video could be either taken from from a webcam (or any kind of video device such as a mobile phone), or from a file already stored on the user’s computer (any kind of video type as it will be converted).

Mailemotion is also provided in white-branded platform.

name: plaYce
overview:
plaYce is “Making the World a Playground” by providing a 3D virtual world for games and social interaction, based on the real world.

plaYce’s proprietary technology automatically and accurately reconstructs the entire world in 3D and streams it with high frame rate from within the browser. Consequently, this unique, immersive, “Mirror World” gaming experience does not rely on a heavy client download. plaYce is designed such that every pixel has a world co-ordinate, enabling integration with user generated content and other forms of geo-tagged data.

plaYce connects gamers with their social graph through quick engagement, synchronous, social games. At the same time, plaYce provides Game-Infrastructure-as-a-Service, enabling independent developers to design games situated anywhere in the world: car races in Hong Kong, first-person shooters in the Amazon, treasure hunts in Manhattan, etc. Aside from the technological benefits, plaYce saves game designers 50-75% of development costs and significant time to market.

name: Spotmau Corporation
overview: Spotmau.com is a provider of leading software utilities products designed for configuring, optimizing and repairing computer systems. The products’ powerfulness and low prices benefit many computer users in the home, SoHo and Business markets.

name: PeopleBrowsr
overview:
A Vast Datamine for Influence Anlytics and Social OS PeopleBrowsr, a San Francisco based company, has combined its Social OS Network Platform, Kred Influencer Analytics and datamine of over one Trillion Conversations to provide Enterprise, Government and new Top Level Domain owners the ability to launch their own social networks, with full engagement and powerful analytics.

PeopleBrowsr is the only company with a 500M+ profiles Datamine, the only one with very High speed Analytics, the only one with Real time Influence Scoring, and the only one Funded by DARPA to build a Next Gen Network

Kred and Social Intelligence PeopleBrowsr, the creator of influence measure Kred, is the world’s largest Social Intelligence Platform. We believe social analytics can accurately depict human behaviors like Influence and Generosity, and that the openness and transparency of social networks will be the catalyst for the next great leap in community and productivity.

Social OS - Dev API for Instant Networks In June 2013, PeopleBrowsr launched Social OS, a next generation Platform as a Service (PaaS), developed under a Darpa funded program. It integrates Social Network capabilities and technologies into their customer databases. Social OS is a rich set of APIs for Developers to rapidly build Social Network applications, and is a bridge between existing networks.

Top Level Domains: dotCEO, dotBEST, dotKred PeopleBrowsr has applied for, and been granted dotCEO, dotKred and dotBest Top Level Domains (TLD). These will be released in late 2013 and early 2014 and will be powered by Social OS, Kred and the PeopleBrowsr Trillion Conversation Datamine. New Domain owners will receive a range of value added services such as a bundled domain name and network product. PeopleBrowsr works with Major Brand TLD applicants to bring the Social conversation into their own domains.

relationships.title: SVP, Head of US Business Development

funding_rounds.source_description: Hammerkit Raises €1.25M in Funding

name: HammerKit
overview:
Hammerkit is a professional-grade web service design and deployment system with all the tools you need to create and launch amazing web experiences. It allows you to build data-centric, feature rich services without coding and enables web designers to go beyond mock-ups and wireframes to build fully functional web sites faster than ever before.

HammerKit was founded in 2006 in Helsinki, Finland with the goal of making designer-friendly tools for the creation of dynamic web services. The company was started by two designers and two coders who set out to challenge the status quo and try to create a new way of building and maintaining data-driven sites. HammerKit 3.5, launched in 2007, introduced a new era of interactive web service building. By deploying a Software as a Service (SaaS) model we were able to offer our customers a complete online web design and assembly service. This gave the company a positive boost and set our vision as being the next generation web service design infrastructure.

Things really started rolling for HammerKit in October 2008 as the company won the Audience Favourite and Best Company awards at the International MindTrek conference held annually in Tampere, Finland. At the end of 2008 the company raised a seed round of funding and was selected by the Finnish National Innovation Organisation, TEKES, as one among ten companies nominated as “Young Innovative Company” with high-growth potential. In 2009 HammerKit was awarded with a Red Herring Global 100 Award as well as recognized as one of the 20 most potential European growth companies at the European Venture Forum in Dusseldorf.

With the launch our latest version of HammerKit we intend to change the landscape of web development and put the power to the hands of web designers enabling them to create flexible, dynamic web services independently, faster and more efficiently than ever before.

name: Virsona
overview:
Virsona, Inc. is a new social media service that lets users create online virtual personas that “come to life” via realistic, real-time chat, allowing people to build relationships with individuals and brands they never thought possible.

Conversations are at the foundation of every relationship and relationships are what drive engagement and loyalty to people and brands. Virsona is redefining how people can connect with one another to strengthen relationships between friends, family, characters or brands.

Virsona enables users to create virtual personas, or Virsonas, of real-life, fictional or historical figures, living or dead, who through an online chat format independently and intuitively remember, react and respond just like the person or brand they were designed to emulate.

The Virsonas are powered by the company’s innovative, patent-pending artificial intelligence technology, which gives the service its human-like chat capabilities. Users create Virsonas by building online life archives of facts, letters, journals, memories and photos and then invite family and friends to access and interact with their Virsona and its content. The more information that is added to a Virsona the more accurate and interactive that Virsona will be.

There are two different types of Virsonas. The first is your own Personal Virsona and the second is Community Virsonas. You can interact with Community Virsonas simply by clicking on the picture and chatting. To add information to an existing Community Virsona or participate in building a new one, you must create an account and log in.

A Personal Virsona allows users to establish a digital immortality by creating and building an interactive legacy and archive for people to communicate with and access for generations to come. With a Personal Virsona based on your own life experiences, you can “live” forever online.

The first step in creating your own Personal Virsona is by establishing a free account and login at www.virsona.com. Once you create your free account, you can start populating your Virsona with your life memories. The more memories and thoughts you add to your Virsona the more your Virsona will remember, reason and react just like you.

Consumers populate their Virsonas thru a chat box. The conversation looks much like an Instant Messaging, or Text Messaging chat. Simply click on the chat box and type away. Consumers can also populate their Virsona with emails, video, photos, etc. Through regular use of the Virsona, users can “train” their online self to act, “speak” and behave like they would in real life. Personal Virsonas can also be shared with friends and family and can be made private or public.

Virsona is the key to consumers’ “immortality.” Note: This is a free service to consumers.

name: MIXTT
overview:
MIXTT is a fresh spin on social networking that enables groups of friends to meet other groups in their city. Users create group profiles for their various “cliques” or “crews,” post and share social plans, then connect with other groups based on common interests or activities.

Unlike other social networking sites, MIXTT aims to facilitate offline interaction, as opposed to merely enhancing time spent at the computer. In addition, MIXTT empowers users to meet people outside of their regular social circles, not just stay in touch with acquaintances they have already established. MIXTT is the Web 2.0 tool for socializing, professional networking, dating, sports playing, or any realm of life that can benefit from a simple, natural, and laid-back way of meeting new people.

funding_rounds.source_description: Producteev launches Group Task Management App at LeWeb08'

name: Producteev
overview: Producteev is one of the leading free Task Management applications for Individuals and Teams connected to : Mac (Mac App Store), Windows Desktop, Web, iPhone, Android, IM (Gtalk, AIM, Yahoo Messenger…), EMail (send tasks to task@producteev.com), Gmail, GCal…

name: eLagaan
overview: eLagaan offers end to end CA, CS, Business legal & Payroll services for startups & growing companies. It specialises in formulating investor friendly structures & terms, staying compliant, setting up best practices desired by founders, investors & employees. This facilitates companies to grow & scale with ease and stay fundable and saleable.

name: My Best Interest
overview: My Best Interest, Inc. created Rate Surfer, a desktop application for use by consumers and small business for managing credit card accounts. Rate surfer’s many features include the ability to semi-automatically maintain the users’ accounts at the lowest interest rate for which they qualify.

name: GoodGuide
overview:
GoodGuide.com provides free and easy access to the world’s largest and most reliable source of information on the health, environmental and social impacts of products and companies.

GoodGuide offers ratings on over 60,000 products commonly found in your home—from baby shampoo to household cleaners—making it quick and easy to find safe and healthy products that are right for you and good for the planet. GoodGuide helps you see what’s behind the label, find better products, get expert advice, and view recommendations based on what’s most important to you. GoodGuide delivers the information you need anytime, anywhere—online or on your phone. In the coming months, GoodGuide will be adding new product information for toys, electronics, automobiles, and beyond, making it the best resource for buying safe, healthy and green products that protect you and your family. On March 16, GoodGuide launched a comprehensive food guide.

name: Mulodo
overview:
Mulodo’s mission is to create platforms for the rediscovery and distribution of information.

Mulodo’s innovations include:

Deckkr Rollscreen, a pop-up tool that lets users get around the web smoothly without opening and shuffling between a lot of different tabs or windows;

Mokuji, which automatically creates an index for your blog, providing easy access to quality entries that would otherwise be buried away at the “back” of your blog; and

indonews.jp, a website dedicated to providing business news, columns and resources from India, all in the Japanese language.

Mulodo also offers website design and creation services, as well as comprehensive internet business consulting. Our services draw on our extensive experience and are executed through insightful strategies formulated based on an accurate grasp of the client’s objectives.

name: Future Delivery
overview:
Future Delivery is a company based in California that combines work and play through Social Media and Technology.

Their goal is to build a platform that makes work fun and allows people to enjoy every moment of their lives.

Future Delivery focuses on introducing products that make productivity fun for Gen-Ys, as this unique generation is increasingly entering the workforce. They have been pioneering the Social Media space, helping companies become more profitable as well as developing personal brands for individuals.

Future Delivery is the place to make you live passionately and convert your life into a game that you strive in.

name: 18D Information Technology China
overview:
This company is an online traditional Chinese book publishing firm.

They are based in Shanghai China and have a marketing division in Beijing. The owner is a Chinese immigrant from Irvine California. He has been in the dot com industry for more 10 years now.

The website is built as an agent for many local Chinese novel writters to achieve their dream of publishing their work.

After one year, the site right now is getting more than 10,000 Page Views and around 5,000 Unique Visits per day. These numbers are growing rapidly. The core feature they are using is the browser based video chatting room system. It enables users a brand new area for communicating.

name: FMYI
overview:
FMYI [for my innovation] is a social collaboration site where you store and share information simply, securely, and sustainably with your team. It combines a social networking site look and feel with tools to achieve your goals while reducing email. Stay on the same page—literally. Manage projects, track contacts, post files, have a shared calendar, free support, and more.

We host over one million workspaces for teams across the globe (Aflac, Hyatt, HBO, Office Depot, Target, Disney, Fox, Sony, etc). Be a part of a revolution that’s been generating media buzz (New York Times, Businessweek, CMSWire, BNET).

relationships.title: Director of HR, Finance, and Operations

name: Displax
overview:
In 2004, believing that it was possible to invent the future, Edigma.com, SA started an R&D program in interactive technologies with CCG/ZGDV and Minho University. This was the basis for the appearance of the Displax® technology. In 2004, the Displax® Interactive Window, a highly innovative product, was successfully launched, winning immediately the award for the most innovative product presented at ComTec - IT, Telecomunications and Digital Image Trade Fair.

Displax® products make it possible to innovate and re-invent ourselves as time goes by, discovering the path into the future.

Many successful installations of Displax® products are being made week by week, day by day, reinforcing the need to develop more and more new interactive technologies. We are dedicated to R&D and it is without a doubt our major investment.

Displax® is opening a new window to the world. Be more than a spectator. Touch it and you will feel the future in your own hands.

name: EdigmaHealthCare
overview: A Edigmahealthcare appeared in the earlier months of 2007 as company of EDIGMA Group, with its own performance style and winning attitude, built on the values of personalization, professionalism and innovation, to which Edigma keeps faithful to. EdigmaHealthcare applies the Edigma knowledge and experience to the health market.

name: iThryv
overview:
UPDATE: In September of 2008 Shryk changed its name to iThryv to alleviate the difference between name and product.

Shryk provides the iThryv next generation online banking platform to financial services organizations, and the integrated weProsper.org community to promote financial literacy.

Shryk provides a next generation online banking platform that creates an immersive environment for users. Shryk has developed the first three flavors, and these are directed at Youth (5 to 11 years old) Teen (12 to 17 years old) and Young Adults (18 to 24 years old.) The system allows users to manage their own bank accounts and be trained in financial literacy at the same time. The Shryk system may be the silver bullet that has been missing in the battle against the issues the US is having with financial literacy. At the same time, we provide a business solution to the banking and credit union industries to start the customer for life paradigm with young kids in a way that provides a whole new set of products for the financial industry.

The second half of this model is that Shryk provides access to the platform to schools and teachers for free, through the weProsper.org community site. This allows a city to start kids in kindergarten with a simulated banking platform that looks exactly like what they will be able to use at a bank with real money when they choose. Not only does this enable schools to teach financial literacy on a sophisticated online delivery system for free, it also provides the onramp to drive new customers to our banking customers. The combination of both sides of this model is being hailed by many people in the financial literacy world as a possible breakthrough use of technology. Shryk is enabling win-win public/private partnerships between financial institutions, schools, and parents in a way that is financially feasible for all. While providing an environment for young people to manage their own finances in a way they simply cannot do at this time.

Shryk solves the following specific problems:

  1. A solution for teaching financial literacy at the point of transaction that is robust and unique. This is critical because of statistics such as the fact that approx. 25% of the personal bankruptcies in the US are filed by people 25 years old or less.
  2. A service that helps banks and credit unions make more money through saving them costs on servicing small kids account on paper, making stickier relationships with parents, and providing an avenue for additional fee revenue
  3. A free tool for schools to teach financial literacy. Many are being mandated to do this by their state government, yet are getting no funds to implement it.

Future flavors that are being planned will target senior citizens, the Spanish community, and young married couples.

funding_rounds.source_description: Kardan

name: Tweegee
overview:
Tweegee L.P is holds the #1 social network and activities for kids in Russia, Turkey and Israel and Recently launch in Brazil and Argentina, now moving ahead to the rest of Latin America and Europe.

Tweegee is a pioneering destination site designed exclusively for kids (Tweens). The site empowers children and pre-teens ages 6 to 13 to express themselves creatively and safely through an innovative and customized online environment. Tweegee integrates social networking, digital content and interactive tools offering kids a complete web platform with high culture sensitive abilities

Tweegee reviewed and qualified for meeting the standards of the Children’s Advertising Review Unit’s kid’s privacy safe harbor program in the USA.

Key Facts

  • More then 3M unique kids visit Tweegee In Russia and Turkey every month alone.

  • Nestla, IKEA, Universal, Disney, CN, Toyota and many other global brands advertise regularly in Tweegee websites.

  • Tweegee won a several awards as the best kids community network in Russia, Turkey and Israel and in the US and was a nomine in “Techcrunch50” and was part of Bizspark1 program by Microsoft.

  • Tweegee expending Rapidly into South America & Europe and was recently launch in Brazil and Argentina.

name: Crisp Thinking
overview:
Crisp Thinking is the global leader in online community management software. Across territories and languages, in MMOs, Social Media and online spaces, Crisp automates, aggregates, escalates and processes in real time, making it possible to manage communities and reputations across multiple platforms and spaces.

The Crisp Community Management Platform protects users from threats such as spam, griefing, scams, bullying and child predators. It profiles, manages and protects, automating many vital functions and helping keep companies compliant with local legislation such as COPPA in the US.

Operating in multiple languages including English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Swedish, the Crisp Platform is a unique single system solution—the first automated enterprise-level system that helps companies manage and moderate all online content within both private and public online communities.

It has an independently tested accuracy rating of 98.4 per cent in the detection of online predators and has been proven to save more than 80 per cent in moderation costs, allowing companies to bring on huge numbers of new customers without the corresponding rise in customer service / moderation staff.

Crisp Technology protects more than 380 million online users worldwide and our clients include Sony Online Entertainment, Turner Broadcasting’s Cartoon Network, Ubisoft, Electronic Arts, the LEGO Group, Kidzbop, Sweety High, Vizwoz, Bin Weevils and Weeworld.

name: Vayersoft
overview:
Vayersoft offers visual solutions for businesses and virtual worlds for everybody.

Visual solutions include 3D rendering and animation, interactive simulation, advergames.

Chobots is the massive multiplayer social game for kids and parents. To be launched in autumn 2008. Find more at www.chobots.com

funding_rounds.source_description: TechCrunch

name: Spare Change Payments
overview:
Spare Change is a micro-payment system designed for social networks.

Users get Spare Change using their credit card, PayPal or mobile phone. Users can then spend Spare Change on any service that accepts Spare Change. Spare Change is accepted on over 700 applications on Facebook, Bebo and MySpace.

relationships.title: Co-Founder, VP of Product and Technology

name: Mexuar Communications
overview:
Mexuar Communications is a software development company specialising in Web & Softphone, Click-to-talk technology and bespoke communication applications. This technology bridges the Internet and Telecommunications across a wide range of businesses and services.

Mexuar’s Corraleta enables developers to create web based communication products for many different online application.

Corraleta takes users from a web page to a VoIP call within 10 seconds. These calls are pure IP from the web browser to a contact centre PBX and are free, irrespective of the location of the caller or contact centre.

As Corraleta can be customised there are many communication uses: Click to talk: for call centres, e-commerce and customer service sites CRM: integrate a dialler to receive and make calls from customer records Email: add a click to talk button in your emails Banners: embed a call function within an online banner advertisement Chat button: use in social and business network sites Dating: communicate privately, 1 to1, without disclosing your number Conference: access audio conferencing from your company web page

Corraleta is a tiny Java technology applet (125kb) which means there is no software to download when initiating a call. As Internet Explorer and Firefox is Java compliant calls can be made instantly whether using Windows, Mac or Linux operating systems. This contrast’s with rival solutions that are flash based or use ActiveX and work only with Windows platforms and the Internet Explorer browser. Calls are registered by the PBX, in this case using Asterisk (IAX) providing VoIP calls to destinations World-wide.

name: RentBureau
overview:
RentBureau is a consumer reporting agency in the US and an credit bureau software as a service company overseas. In the US, RentBureau collects how apartment residents pay their rent and uses that data to build apartment resident credit files.

RentBureau is a consumer reporting agency. Data is collected directly from apartment property management systems on a daily basis. Apartment screening services access our data in order to inform their screening decisions.

name: SenderOK
overview:
SenderOK is a project and company name. As a project, SenderOK solves the email overload problem by prioritizing messages according to their sender importance and by alerting to new important messages arrival.

SenderOK treats the email management problem socially by analyzing relationships between senders and recipients and assigning them certain values of network power.

As a result of this approach, SenderOK organizes users’ work flow in such a way that unimportant and spam messages remain unseen.

Thus, SenderOK improves information management and productivity enabling users to accomplish more in less time.

SenderOK has six patent-pending innovations.

SenderOK is a Ukrainian team of experienced developers previously involved in a successful international self-financed project.

name: Intelligenes
overview: Intelligenes is a web enabled solutions provider that provides design and development solutions to clients in Pakistan and abroad.

funding_rounds.source_description: Alarm:Clock

name: Lolapps
overview:
Entertaining over 100 million users per month, Lolapps provides the largest network of social games and applications on Facebook. Our most recent game Ravenwood Fair is currently in the top 10 games on Facebook with over 11MM monthly unique users.

We make social games and applications that are unique, entertaining and make people laugh…out loud. We began with virtual quizzes and gifting, and we’ve quickly become one of the most recognizable social developers in the space. Our Quiz and Gift Creator platforms allow hundreds of thousands of users to create and distribute their own social applications without any programming knowledge. Due to an intuitive user interface and a keen understanding of social marketing we have harnessed the creativity of a vast social network.

Virtual goods are an integral feature of most social games, and our experience in this arena is second to none. Utilizing easy to learn and engaging features, stunning imagery, and in-depth story lines, these games are quickly being recognized as a standard for what is to come in the social gaming space.

Game design is largely driven by user feedback, we are able to stay in step with the demands of our target demographics. Users appreciate this level of care and attentiveness, and we believe this is why enthusiastic players adopt our games early and continue to get behind our newest titles.

We’re hiring! Downtown SF Soma office, free yoga, fresh organic meals prepared onsite daily, and GAMES

name: Call Me Later
overview: CallMeLater.com is a unique service that allows you to schedule wake up call and reminder service.

name: Yerbabuena Software
overview: Smart technologies for world-class software.

name: PIEmatrix
overview:
PIEmatrix helps organizations reduce project risk with an online platform that connects process standards with daily tasks of each team member.

One unique feature is the ability to integrate multiple process standards, such as project management, risk management, quality, regulations, etc. Another unique feature is a new visual pie and matrix model that provides a simple user experience. If the customer has the right steps to reduce risk and save money, they can use the PIEmatrix platform to make it easy for all team members to use and stick to those steps.

PIEmatrix does not provide customer process content. Instead it offers an open platform with an authoring tool to help the customer add content in minutes, create templates, which then is leveraged by project managers. Once the teams start to implement projects with these steps, they can also add their own custom tasks, due dates, people assignments, and working documents. Management can then ensure compliance since all team tasks are linked with real-time governance reports that show best practice adherence. PIEmatrix is like a cross between process management and project management, but more simple than both since it’s designed to be used easily by all project teams and stakeholders.

name: Tools To Life
overview:
Tools To Life is the first interactive online self help social networking program where members create real life changes. As the popularity of Social Networks continue to grow at an exponential rate, easy and affordable access is quickly becoming a necessity of life.

Tools To Life provides members with the ability to enjoy the support of an engaging community, share experiences in a “privacy-wherever-you-want-it” environment and work on improving aspects of their lives using our one-of-a-kind Multi-media Online Learning Platform, the “Toolbox.” Tools offers its programs to adults and adolescents of all ages and backgrounds to come and enjoy the unique, upscale, educational, and innovative environment within its community.

How has Tools To Life positioned itself for success?

Through continual improvement upon the dynamic interface, unique content and rich, innovative, upscale atmosphere that differentiates Tools from other current and future Social Networks.

The establishment of Tools as a community hub for socialization based around creating Personal Positive Change.

Providing an environment that does not intimidate the novice user. Tools is in the position itself as an educational resource for ANY individuals wanting to achieve goals, lose weight, quit smoking and endless list of life changes.

Expanding unique Tool sets allowing members to track and organize goals and objectives and challenge themselves to grow.

Videos that both entertain and provide life lessons only available on the tools network.

Attracting new experts to contribute content.

To become THE destination for experts from around the world to broadcast self improvement programming and a resource for its members through social interaction and rich content material.

name: Docgle
overview:
Docgle is the next generation web 2.0 document management system. It is user friendly and will bring revolution to the traditional way of document management. It has combined natural language processing and artificial intelligence technology into the document management system to make it a Docile document management system.

It learns how the user categorized the document and will help automatically classify the documents and link them together for easy retrieval and searching. The system has all the comprehensive feature expected from a powerful document management system including multi-lingual full text search, dynamic document profile, version control, audit trail, workflow approval and a RESTful architecture.

name: Mashed Life
overview:
Mashed Life in a free and secure online password manager that helps users organize their Web 2.0 accounts.

MashedLife.com is a new way to manage all of your web subscriptions. This handy website lets users sign up for free and store their log in information into a safe and secure location. The user creates their own Mashed Life that comprises of multiple “accounts.” Each account deals with a website he or she may use. These accounts hold their username, password, and notes on the specific site. After creating the account, the user can utilize the one click log in feature on all of their accounts. This feature allows Mashed Life to submit the log in information to the user’s site in just one click; removing the necessity to enter log in information repeatedly. It is that easy.

For those worried about Security, Mashed Life has certifications from Truste, the Better Business Bureau, and Verisign. The creators of this site have backgrounds working at internet security companies and dealing with government security technology. For those who need the utmost security, Mashed Life offers one-time password secure login integration. USB keyboard based one-time password generators, create 128-bit random passwords that can be used to log into Mashed Life. More details can be at http://umikey.com or http://yubico.com.

Overall, Mashed Life aims to ease the burden of increasing web accounts by offering users a free, secure, and easy way to store their information online. In a few short minutes, you could be on your way to a more fun and efficient web browsing experience. Screen Shots are attached in e-mail.

This site has many features such as:

*Facebook Application – Used to connect Facebook and Mashed Life. *iPhone Browser – For password management on the go. *Account Sharing – Sharing account access without revealing log in information. *Usage Statistics – Graph showing what accounts use what log ins when sharing accounts. *Yubikey Integration – Allows users to log in with a Yubikey, a password generating USB device. *One Click Log In – Allows Mashed Life to fill in the log in information for a specific site in just one click. *Uncompromising Security – Truste, Better Business Bureau, and Verisign certifications. *Security Staff – The creators of this website are ex Verisign employees and other individuals who have worked on government level security programs.

So go check out www.mashedlife.com and see for yourself how easy, secure, and efficient managing your passwords can be.

name: Gamelet
overview:

name: PX Interactive
overview:
PX Interactive are developers of the NetDog networking engine for MMOs and Virtual Worlds.

Netdog is positioned as a high performance toolset for game developers and virtual world designers. As such, primary features include load balancing and load distribution tools, seamless world functionality, performance optimization tools, and an intuitive interface that is easy to learn and customize.

NetDog has two major features. First, NetDog is fully cross-platform - developers will be able to create games that can be played across PC, Mac, PS3, Xbox 360, and even iPhone. Network messages will work regardless of the platform, bringing more gamers into each game, and providing unique gameplay options.

Second, NetDog’s architecture is built on a patent-pending distributed networking solution. With small setting changes NetDog can be used in a variety of network topologies - from full client server mode to fully peer-to-peer, with a variety of network computing options in-between. Developers will have the option to off-load some or all of their game processing to the clients in their network, and can choose which functions and events will be handled where. This will allow for bigger, more efficient networks with lower latencies

PX Interactive overview PX Interactive is led by a team of technologists and game industry veterans with entrepreneurial experience. The company’s objective is to become the top player in the defined niche of high-speed networking for 3D worlds. As such, they are targetting game developers and virtual world designers of all sizes.

name: PickUpPal
overview:
PickUpPal provides a venue for either passengers or packages to find or be matched to a driver. An intelligent matching algorithm matches passengers with drivers traveling to a similar location, through a similar route.

Passengers submit where they want to travel and drivers submit where they will be going. Those going the same way are matched together, and the passenger chooses a driver based on price and driver feedback ratings.

name: Connective Logic
overview:
Connective Logic has created the Blueprint software development platform which, along with our real-time middleware, enables software developers to design, code generate and deploy very complex multi-core software applications without requiring expertise in the field of “multi-threaded” software.

Developing software to fully exploit multi-core CPUs is technically challenging and current development tools in the market are widely acknowledged to be inadequate.

Blueprint enables software that scales out over any number of CPU cores and networked computers, and ensures optimal load balancing and CPU utilisation.

Blueprint delivers significant reductions in software development costs, dramatically reduces time-to-market, lowers software development risk, improves application performance, safeguards investment in existing sequential code, reduces dependency on scarce multithreading experts and significantly reduces lock-in to operating systems and hardware platforms.

Blueprint and its underlying middleware are unique in the market place. The middleware has been proven in very demanding production systems within the UK Defence Industry.

name: Shattered Reality Interactive
overview:
Shattered Reality was founded in 2006 with the mission of creating online social immersive worlds, that are engaging, epic, and easy to understand whether the game is serious or casual. The big original vision was to create a theme based Massive Multiplayer Online Game that could be played in 5-10 minute time increments anytime, from anywhere.

Today popular online games, like World of Warcraft and Everquest, allow players to explore large and vast fantasy worlds, however they require huge time commitments and are considered “isolated” in their walled gardens. The games created by Shattered Reality provide “theme-based” and “hit-based” accomplishment for both the hardcore and casual gamers. What’s great about us is that we leverage the hardcore gaming production values and bridge the gap for online social games.

The first title to be released is, Legends of Kaos (LoK), a free 2 play multiplayer ancient sci-fi fantasy that combines the head-to-head play, collectability and trading associated with virtual powers and collectible action items. We also leverage level advancement and character development of massively multi-player games (MMORPGs) with the ease of access and community aspects of Web “two-point-oh” applications. LoK will also be available on Facebook and Myspace. LoK and other games developed by Shattered Reality are free 2 play. Players have the option to trade or sell items to other players and they can even sign up for VIP memberships for a small subscription fee.

name: GazoPa
overview: GazoPa is an image search engine by Hitachi that uses features from an image to search for and identify similar images. There are abundant quantities of images on the web, however many of these simply cannot be described by keywords, keywords are not sufficient as conditions for image searches. Since GazoPa uses image features such as a color or a shape to search other similar images, a vast range of images can be retrieved from the web. In addition to images found using keyword searches, GazoPa enables the use of users’ own photos and drawings, and images found on the web, as search keys to locate similar images. GazoPa can support not only photo but also the search of video thumbnail. GazoPa lets users find favorite video from similarity of video thumbnail.

name: plaYce
overview:
plaYce is “Making the World a Playground” by providing a 3D virtual world for games and social interaction, based on the real world.

plaYce’s proprietary technology automatically and accurately reconstructs the entire world in 3D and streams it with high frame rate from within the browser. Consequently, this unique, immersive, “Mirror World” gaming experience does not rely on a heavy client download. plaYce is designed such that every pixel has a world co-ordinate, enabling integration with user generated content and other forms of geo-tagged data.

plaYce connects gamers with their social graph through quick engagement, synchronous, social games. At the same time, plaYce provides Game-Infrastructure-as-a-Service, enabling independent developers to design games situated anywhere in the world: car races in Hong Kong, first-person shooters in the Amazon, treasure hunts in Manhattan, etc. Aside from the technological benefits, plaYce saves game designers 50-75% of development costs and significant time to market.

A Vast Datamine for Influence Anlytics and Social OS PeopleBrowsr, a San Francisco based company, has combined its Social OS Network Platform, Kred Influencer Analytics and datamine of over one Trillion Conversations to provide Enterprise, Government and new Top Level Domain owners the ability to launch their own social networks, with full engagement and powerful analytics.

PeopleBrowsr is the only company with a 500M+ profiles Datamine, the only one with very High speed Analytics, the only one with Real time Influence Scoring, and the only one Funded by DARPA to build a Next Gen Network

Kred and Social Intelligence PeopleBrowsr, the creator of influence measure Kred, is the world’s largest Social Intelligence Platform. We believe social analytics can accurately depict human behaviors like Influence and Generosity, and that the openness and transparency of social networks will be the catalyst for the next great leap in community and productivity.

Social OS - Dev API for Instant Networks In June 2013, PeopleBrowsr launched Social OS, a next generation Platform as a Service (PaaS), developed under a Darpa funded program. It integrates Social Network capabilities and technologies into their customer databases. Social OS is a rich set of APIs for Developers to rapidly build Social Network applications, and is a bridge between existing networks.

Top Level Domains: dotCEO, dotBEST, dotKred PeopleBrowsr has applied for, and been granted dotCEO, dotKred and dotBest Top Level Domains (TLD). These will be released in late 2013 and early 2014 and will be powered by Social OS, Kred and the PeopleBrowsr Trillion Conversation Datamine. New Domain owners will receive a range of value added services such as a bundled domain name and network product. funding_rounds.source_description: Hammerkit Raises €1.25M in Funding

name: HammerKit
overview:
Hammerkit is a professional-grade web service design and deployment system with all the tools you need to create and launch amazing web experiences. It allows you to build data-centric, feature rich services without coding and enables web designers to go beyond mock-ups and wireframes to build fully functional web sites faster than ever before.

HammerKit was founded in 2006 in Helsinki, Finland with the goal of making designer-friendly tools for the creation of dynamic web services. The company was started by two designers and two coders who set out to challenge the status quo and try to create a new way of building and maintaining data-driven sites. HammerKit 3.5, launched in 2007, introduced a new era of interactive web service building. By deploying a Software as a Service (SaaS) model we were able to offer our customers a complete online web design and assembly service. This gave the company a positive boost and set our vision as being the next generation web service design infrastructure.

Things really started rolling for HammerKit in October 2008 as the company won the Audience Favourite and Best Company awards at the International MindTrek conference held annually in Tampere, Finland. At the end of 2008 the company raised a seed round of funding and was selected by the Finnish National Innovation Organisation, TEKES, as one among ten companies nominated as “Young Innovative Company” with high-growth potential. In 2009 HammerKit was awarded with a Red Herring Global 100 Award as well as recognized as one of the 20 most potential European growth companies at the European Venture Forum in Dusseldorf.

With the launch our latest version of HammerKit we intend to change the landscape of web development and put the power to the hands of web designers enabling them to create flexible, dynamic web services independently, faster and more efficiently than ever before.

name: Virsona
overview:
Virsona, Inc. is a new social media service that lets users create online virtual personas that “come to life” via realistic, real-time chat, allowing people to build relationships with individuals and brands they never thought possible.

Conversations are at the foundation of every relationship and relationships are what drive engagement and loyalty to people and brands. Virsona is redefining how people can connect with one another to strengthen relationships between friends, family, characters or brands.

Virsona enables users to create virtual personas, or Virsonas, of real-life, fictional or historical figures, living or dead, who through an online chat format independently and intuitively remember, react and respond just like the person or brand they were designed to emulate.

The Virsonas are powered by the company’s innovative, patent-pending artificial intelligence technology, which gives the service its human-like chat capabilities. Users create Virsonas by building online life archives of facts, letters, journals, memories and photos and then invite family and friends to access and interact with their Virsona and its content. The more information that is added to a Virsona the more accurate and interactive that Virsona will be.

There are two different types of Virsonas. The first is your own Personal Virsona and the second is Community Virsonas. You can interact with Community Virsonas simply by clicking on the picture and chatting. To add information to an existing Community Virsona or participate in building a new one, you must create an account and log in.

A Personal Virsona allows users to establish a digital immortality by creating and building an interactive legacy and archive for people to communicate with and access for generations to come. With a Personal Virsona based on your own life experiences, you can “live” forever online.

The first step in creating your own Personal Virsona is by establishing a free account and login at www.virsona.com. Once you create your free account, you can start populating your Virsona with your life memories. The more memories and thoughts you add to your Virsona the more your Virsona will remember, reason and react just like you.

Consumers populate their Virsonas thru a chat box. The conversation looks much like an Instant Messaging, or Text Messaging chat. Simply click on the chat box and type away. Consumers can also populate their Virsona with emails, video, photos, etc. Through regular use of the Virsona, users can “train” their online self to act, “speak” and behave like they would in real life. Personal Virsonas can also be shared with friends and family and can be made private or public.

Virsona is the key to consumers’ “immortality.” Note: This is a free service to consumers.

name: MIXTT
overview:
MIXTT is a fresh spin on social networking that enables groups of friends to meet other groups in their city. Users create group profiles for their various “cliques” or “crews,” post and share social plans, then connect with other groups based on common interests or activities.

Unlike other social networking sites, MIXTT aims to facilitate offline interaction, as opposed to merely enhancing time spent at the computer. In addition, MIXTT empowers users to meet people outside of their regular social circles, not just stay in touch with acquaintances they have already established. MIXTT is the Web 2.0 tool for socializing, professional networking, dating, sports playing, or any realm of life that can benefit from a simple, natural, and laid-back way of meeting new people.

name: GoodGuide
overview:
GoodGuide.com provides free and easy access to the world’s largest and most reliable source of information on the health, environmental and social impacts of products and companies.

GoodGuide offers ratings on over 60,000 products commonly found in your home—from baby shampoo to household cleaners—making it quick and easy to find safe and healthy products that are right for you and good for the planet. GoodGuide helps you see what’s behind the label, find better products, get expert advice, and view recommendations based on what’s most important to you. GoodGuide delivers the information you need anytime, anywhere—online or on your phone. In the coming months, GoodGuide will be adding new product information for toys, electronics, automobiles, and beyond, making it the best resource for buying safe, healthy and green products that protect you and your family. On March 16, GoodGuide launched a comprehensive food guide.

name: Mulodo
overview:
Mulodo’s mission is to create platforms for the rediscovery and distribution of information.

Mulodo’s innovations include:

Deckkr Rollscreen, a pop-up tool that lets users get around the web smoothly without opening and shuffling between a lot of different tabs or windows;

Mokuji, which automatically creates an index for your blog, providing easy access to quality entries that would otherwise be buried away at the “back” of your blog; and

indonews.jp, a website dedicated to providing business news, columns and resources from India, all in the Japanese language.

Mulodo also offers website design and creation services, as well as comprehensive internet business consulting. Our services draw on our extensive experience and are executed through insightful strategies formulated based on an accurate grasp of the client’s objectives.

name: Future Delivery
overview:
Future Delivery is a company based in California that combines work and play through Social Media and Technology.

Their goal is to build a platform that makes work fun and allows people to enjoy every moment of their lives.

Future Delivery focuses on introducing products that make productivity fun for Gen-Ys, as this unique generation is increasingly entering the workforce. They have been pioneering the Social Media space, helping companies become more profitable as well as developing personal brands for individuals.

name: iThryv
overview:
UPDATE: In September of 2008 Shryk changed its name to iThryv to alleviate the difference between name and product.

Shryk provides the iThryv next generation online banking platform to financial services organizations, and the integrated weProsper.org community to promote financial literacy.

Shryk provides a next generation online banking platform that creates an immersive environment for users. Shryk has developed the first three flavors, and these are directed at Youth (5 to 11 years old) Teen (12 to 17 years old) and Young Adults (18 to 24 years old.) The system allows users to manage their own bank accounts and be trained in financial literacy at the same time. The Shryk system may be the silver bullet that has been missing in the battle against the issues the US is having with financial literacy. At the same time, we provide a business solution to the banking and credit union industries to start the customer for life paradigm with young kids in a way that provides a whole new set of products for the financial industry.

The second half of this model is that Shryk provides access to the platform to schools and teachers for free, through the weProsper.org community site. This allows a city to start kids in kindergarten with a simulated banking platform that looks exactly like what they will be able to use at a bank with real money when they choose. Not only does this enable schools to teach financial literacy on a sophisticated online delivery system for free, it also provides the onramp to drive new customers to our banking customers. The combination of both sides of this model is being hailed by many people in the financial literacy world as a possible breakthrough use of technology. Shryk is enabling win-win public/private partnerships between financial institutions, schools, and parents in a way that is financially feasible for all. While providing an environment for young people to manage their own finances in a way they simply cannot do at this time.

Shryk solves the following specific problems:

  1. A solution for teaching financial literacy at the point of transaction that is robust and unique. This is critical because of statistics such as the fact that approx. 25% of the personal bankruptcies in the US are filed by people 25 years old or less.
  2. A service that helps banks and credit unions make more money through saving them costs on servicing small kids account on paper, making stickier relationships with parents, and providing an avenue for additional fee revenue
  3. A free tool for schools to teach financial literacy. Many are being mandated to do this by their state government, yet are getting no funds to implement it.

Future flavors that are being planned will target senior citizens, the Spanish community, and young married couples.

name: Crisp Thinking
overview:
Crisp Thinking is the global leader in online community management software. Across territories and languages, in MMOs, Social Media and online spaces, Crisp automates, aggregates, escalates and processes in real time, making it possible to manage communities and reputations across multiple platforms and spaces.

The Crisp Community Management Platform protects users from threats such as spam, griefing, scams, bullying and child predators. It profiles, manages and protects, automating many vital functions and helping keep companies compliant with local legislation such as COPPA in the US.

Operating in multiple languages including English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Swedish, the Crisp Platform is a unique single system solution—the first automated enterprise-level system that helps companies manage and moderate all online content within both private and public online communities.

It has an independently tested accuracy rating of 98.4 per cent in the detection of online predators and has been proven to save more than 80 per cent in moderation costs, allowing companies to bring on huge numbers of new customers without the corresponding rise in customer service / moderation staff.

Crisp Technology protects more than 380 million online users worldwide and our clients include Sony Online Entertainment, Turner Broadcasting’s Cartoon Network, Ubisoft, Electronic Arts, the LEGO Group, Kidzbop, Sweety High, Vizwoz, Bin Weevils and Weeworld.

name: Mexuar Communications
overview:
Mexuar Communications is a software development company specialising in Web & Softphone, Click-to-talk technology and bespoke communication applications. This technology bridges the Internet and Telecommunications across a wide range of businesses and services.

Mexuar’s Corraleta enables developers to create web based communication products for many different online application.

Corraleta takes users from a web page to a VoIP call within 10 seconds. These calls are pure IP from the web browser to a contact centre PBX and are free, irrespective of the location of the caller or contact centre.

As Corraleta can be customised there are many communication uses: Click to talk: for call centres, e-commerce and customer service sites CRM: integrate a dialler to receive and make calls from customer records Email: add a click to talk button in your emails Banners: embed a call function within an online banner advertisement Chat button: use in social and business network sites Dating: communicate privately, 1 to1, without disclosing your number Conference: access audio conferencing from your company web page

Corraleta is a tiny Java technology applet (125kb) which means there is no software to download when initiating a call. As Internet Explorer and Firefox is Java compliant calls can be made instantly whether using Windows, Mac or Linux operating systems. This contrast’s with rival solutions that are flash based or use ActiveX and work only with Windows platforms and the Internet Explorer browser. Calls are registered by the PBX, in this case using Asterisk (IAX) providing VoIP calls to destinations World-wide.

overview:
SenderOK is a project and company name. As a project, SenderOK solves the email overload problem by prioritizing messages according to their sender importance and by alerting to new important messages arrival.

SenderOK treats the email management problem socially by analyzing relationships between senders and recipients and assigning them certain values of network power.

As a result of this approach, SenderOK organizes users’ work flow in such a way that unimportant and spam messages remain unseen.

Thus, SenderOK improves information management and productivity enabling users to accomplish more in less time.

SenderOK has six patent-pending innovations.

SenderOK is a Ukrainian team of experienced developers previously involved in a successful international self-financed project.

name: PIEmatrix
overview:
PIEmatrix helps organizations reduce project risk with an online platform that connects process standards with daily tasks of each team member.

One unique feature is the ability to integrate multiple process standards, such as project management, risk management, quality, regulations, etc. Another unique feature is a new visual pie and matrix model that provides a simple user experience. If the customer has the right steps to reduce risk and save money, they can use the PIEmatrix platform to make it easy for all team members to use and stick to those steps.

PIEmatrix does not provide customer process content. Instead it offers an open platform with an authoring tool to help the customer add content in minutes, create templates, which then is leveraged by project managers. Once the teams start to implement projects with these steps, they can also add their own custom tasks, due dates, people assignments, and working documents. Management can then ensure compliance since all team tasks are linked with real-time governance reports that show best practice adherence. PIEmatrix is like a cross between process management and project management, but more simple than both since it’s designed to be used easily by all project teams and stakeholders.

name: Docgle

It has combined natural language processing and artificial intelligence technology into the document management system to make it a Docile document management system.

It learns how the user categorized the document and will help automatically classify the documents and link them together for easy retrieval and searching. The system has all the comprehensive feature expected from a powerful document management system including multi-lingual full text search, dynamic document profile, version control, audit trail, workflow approval and a RESTful architecture.

name: Tools To Life
overview:
Tools To Life is the first interactive online self help social networking program where members create real life changes. As the popularity of Social Networks continue to grow at an exponential rate, easy and affordable access is quickly becoming a necessity of life.

Tools To Life provides members with the ability to enjoy the support of an engaging community, share experiences in a “privacy-wherever-you-want-it” environment and work on improving aspects of their lives using our one-of-a-kind Multi-media Online Learning Platform, the “Toolbox.” Tools offers its programs to adults and adolescents of all ages and backgrounds to come and enjoy the unique, upscale, educational, and innovative environment within its community.

How has Tools To Life positioned itself for success?

Through continual improvement upon the dynamic interface, unique content and rich, innovative, upscale atmosphere that differentiates Tools from other current and future Social Networks.

The establishment of Tools as a community hub for socialization based around creating Personal Positive Change.

Providing an environment that does not intimidate the novice user. Tools is in the position itself as an educational resource for ANY individuals wanting to achieve goals, lose weight, quit smoking and endless list of life changes.

Expanding unique Tool sets allowing members to track and organize goals and objectives and challenge themselves to grow.

Videos that both entertain and provide life lessons only available on the tools network.

Attracting new experts to contribute content.

To become THE destination for experts from around the world to broadcast self improvement programming and a resource for its members through social interaction and rich content material.

name: Mashed Life
overview:
Mashed Life in a free and secure online password manager that helps users organize their Web 2.0 accounts.

MashedLife.com is a new way to manage all of your web subscriptions. This handy website lets users sign up for free and store their log in information into a safe and secure location. The user creates their own Mashed Life that comprises of multiple “accounts.” Each account deals with a website he or she may use. These accounts hold their username, password, and notes on the specific site. After creating the account, the user can utilize the one click log in feature on all of their accounts. This feature allows Mashed Life to submit the log in information to the user’s site in just one click; removing the necessity to enter log in information repeatedly. It is that easy.

For those worried about Security, Mashed Life has certifications from Truste, the Better Business Bureau, and Verisign. The creators of this site have backgrounds working at internet security companies and dealing with government security technology. For those who need the utmost security, Mashed Life offers one-time password secure login integration. USB keyboard based one-time password generators, create 128-bit random passwords that can be used to log into Mashed Life. More details can be at http://umikey.com or http://yubico.com.

Overall, Mashed Life aims to ease the burden of increasing web accounts by offering users a free, secure, and easy way to store their information online. In a few short minutes, you could be on your way to a more fun and efficient web browsing experience. Screen Shots are attached in e-mail.

This site has many features such as:

*Facebook Application – Used to connect Facebook and Mashed Life. *iPhone Browser – For password management on the go. *Account Sharing – Sharing account access without revealing log in information. *Usage Statistics – Graph showing what accounts use what log ins when sharing accounts. *Yubikey Integration – Allows users to log in with a Yubikey, a password generating USB device. *One Click Log In – Allows Mashed Life to fill in the log in information for a specific site in just one click. *Uncompromising Security – Truste, Better Business Bureau, and Verisign certifications. *Security Staff – The creators of this website are ex Verisign employees and other individuals who have worked on government level security programs.

So go check out www.mashedlife.com and see for yourself how easy, secure, and efficient managing your passwords can be.

Software testing services cover a comprehensive portfolio of testing types different types with the end goal in mind; measure improve product quality. Here are some of the tests that we perform:

  • Acceptance testing
  • Automated testing
  • Black box/functional testing
  • Exploratory or Ad-hoc testing
  • Globalization/Localization
  • Integration testing

  • Mobile application testing
  • Performance testing
  • Regression testing
  • Smoke testing
  • Security testing

  • Upgrade testing

Accurate Bug Reporting and Tracking: Our quality assurance team works with your development team to directly input bugs into your system or can give you online access to ours via XBO CommONE. overview:
AggData is short for “aggregate data”; the site provides usable, portable databases of information extracted from across the web. Specializing in location based information, such as complete geocoded lists of retail chain locations, the quality of the data is assured by extracting from original, first-hand online sources, rather than re-tooling third-party databases.

AggData was started in 2006 as a side project of the founder, Chris Hathaway, to try and address a need discovered through his work and study in data extraction. The World Wide Web, while comprehensive and full of valuable information, often lacks organization and portability, siloing data into closed proprietary systems. While this aspect of the Internet can be credited for its massive exponential growth, it is also to blame for its biggest weakness: the inability to find what you’re looking for.

The goal of AggData is to play a small part in making this sought-out data more accessible, portable and reliable. That small side project in 2006 is now a company of 15 employees, with over 1900 lists, continuously growing month after month. Aggdata is a virtual company with the tools, resources, and flexibility to handle data extraction and collection projects large and small, and has provided valuable services to many large corporations, including Petco, Starbucks, and Morgan Stanley.
